title: Air India Premium Economy Class: Check Routes, Features, Ticket Price and More
author: Trending Desk
excerpt: Air India Premium Economy Class: Destinations, Amenities, Ticket Costs, and more for Air India's premium economy seats, Latest updates at news18.com
abstract:
Air India is set to provide flyers with a new experience through its Premium Economy class. Starting May 15, the airline will become the only Indian carrier to offer four cabin classes to its consumers– Economy, Premium Economy, 
Business
 and First class. The Premium Economy class will be available on select long-haul flights that will be operated by Air India's fleet of Boeing 777-200LR aircraft between India and the United States.

Air India Premium Economy Class Routes
The facility will be initially available on the Mumbai-New York, Bengaluru-San Francisco and Mumbai-San Francisco routes.

title: Air India to introduce premium economy class in US flights
author: PTI
excerpt: Air India said it has opened sale for the new cabin, for travel starting May 15, 2023, becoming the first and only Indian carrier to offer the choice of four cabin classes.
abstract:
Air India on Friday said it will introduce premium economy class for travel from May 15 in select flights to the US.
 
The premium economy class will initially be available in select flights operated with Boeing 777-200LR aircraft on Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York routes.
 
In a release, the airline said it has 'opened sale for the new cabin, for travel starting May 15, 2023, becoming the first and only Indian carrier to offer the choice of four cabin classes – First, Business, Premium Economy, and Economy'.

title: Politicians advised to mend fences to prevent economic meltdown
author: Express Tribune
excerpt: Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency…
abstract:
Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency likely plunging to Rs500 against the US dollar if the situation persists.
Former prime minister Nawaz Sharif also anticipated late last week that the local currency could slump to Rs500 against the greenback, if the political situation worsens.
Against this backdrop, business leaders demand that all stakeholders end the political deadlock, mend bridges and work towards political unity and stability in a bid to rescue, rehabilitate and revive the economy.

title: Digital economy has a New Global Captain – India
excerpt: India is fast emerging as a leader in the global digital economy. The country's digital economy has grown rapidly over the last few years, thanks to a range of factors, including the contributions of…
abstract: India is fast emerging as a leader in the global digital economy. The country's digital economy has grown rapidly over the last few years, thanks to a range of factors, including the contributions of Narendra Modi, private players, India's technical golden age, digital initiatives of the government, market changes, Make in India, and Digital India programs, and the Indian population's eagerness to adapt quickly. In this article, we will provide a comprehensive analysis of these factors that have enabled India to lead the digital economy globally.

title: Politicians advised to mend fences to prevent economic meltdown
author: Tribune
excerpt: Business leaders urge both govt and opposition to mend bridges for sake of economy
abstract:
KARACHI:



Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency likely plunging to Rs500 against the US dollar if the situation persists.


Former prime minister Nawaz Sharif also anticipated late last week that the local currency could slump to Rs500 against the greenback, if the political situation worsens.


Against this backdrop, business leaders demand that all stakeholders end the political deadlock, mend bridges and work towards political unity and stability in a bid to rescue, rehabilitate and revive the economy.

title: Air India Adds Premium Economy Cabin Class On Select India-United States Flights
author: Zee Media Bureau
excerpt: The Premium Economy will be available to customers travelling on Air India's Boeing 777-200LR aircraft to Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York.
abstract: Air India, the Tata Group airline and former national airline of India has introduced Premium Economy cabin class on its select India-United States international flights. The passengers will be offered a better cabin product, in-flight services, and added on-ground convenience, said Air India. With this, Air India has become the first airline in India to offer four cabin class options to its passengers on international flights, including Economy, Premium Economy, Business and First Class. As per IANS, the Premium Economy will be available to customers travelling on Boeing 777-200LR aircraft to Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York.

title: Air India to introduce premium economy class in US flights from 15 May
author: Livemint
excerpt: In November last year, AI chief Campbell Wilson announced the plans to introduce premium economy class in some long haul international flights.
abstract:
Air India announced that it will introduce premium economy class for travel from 15 May in selected flights to the US. 
 
 
 As per the carrier, the premium economy class will initially be available in selected flights operated with Boeing 777-200LR aircraft on Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York routes. It further added that the premium economy class seats will also be rolled out on several other routes
 
 
 
 In a release, it stated that it has "opened sale for the new cabin, for travel starting May 15, 2023, becoming the first and only Indian carrier to offer the choice of four cabin classes - First, Business, Premium Economy, and Economy".

title: AMRO-economy outlook
author: 강윤승 기자
excerpt: S. Korean economy to expand 2.3 pct in 2024: AMRO By Kang Yoon-seung SEOUL, April 6 (Yonhap) -- An economic surveillance
abstract: S. Korean economy to expand 2.3 pct in 2024: AMROBy Kang Yoon-seung SEOUL, April 6 (Yonhap) -- An economic surveillance organization in Asia expected the South Korean economy to expand 2.3 percent in 2024, with inflation expected to further lose steam in the year as well. The ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office (AMRO) made the assessment in its regional report after predicting Asia's No. 4 economy would expand 1.7 percent this year earlier this week amid slowing exports. South Korea's inflation is expected to reach 2.

title: Choose your meal, get free gifts on your next Air India travel; Here's how
author: ET Online
excerpt: Air India has Air India introduced a new Premium Economy class for travellers, which offers a superior cabin product, world-class inflight services, and added on-ground convenience. The airline has…
abstract:
31 Mar 2023, 05:37 PM IST
Air India has Air India introduced a new Premium Economy class for travellers, which offers a superior cabin product, world-class inflight services, and added on-ground convenience. The airline has opened sale for the new cabin for travel starting May 15, 2023. With this Air India has become the only Indian carrier to offer four cabin classes: First, Business, Premium Economy, and Economy.
"Air India's Premium Economy offers an exclusive travel experience designed for customers who do not mind paying a reasonable premium over Economy Class fares to fly in style and enjoy a lot more space, comfort, and convenience," the company said in a press release.

title: UK economy grew at the end of last year
author: BBC News
excerpt: The economy performed better than previously estimated in the final three months of 2022, new figures show.
abstract:
Image source, 
Getty Images
The UK economy performed better than previously estimated at the end of last year, revised official figures show.
It was previously thought the economy had not grown in the last three months of 2022, but new 
Office for National Statistics data
 shows it grew by 0.1%.
The latest figures confirm that the UK economy avoided falling into recession at the end of 2022.
The ONS said telecommunications, construction and manufacturing had all fared better than initially thought.

title: FLASHBACK: Akufo-Addo speaks with BBC Africa on Ghana's economy, E-Levy
author: GhanaWeb
excerpt: In April 2022, BBC Africa released the first part of an interview with President Nana Akufo-Addo on Ghana's economy.
abstract:
Wed, 5 Apr 2023
 
Source:
 
www.ghanaweb.com
 


In April 2022, BBC Africa released the first part of an interview with President Nana Akufo-Addo on Ghana's economy.
The conversation between the President and Okochwe covered various sectors of the Ghanaian economy and recent occurrences in the socio-political space of the country.
Read the full story originally published on April 5, 2022, by GhanaWeb
 
There was a banter between President 
Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo
 and the BBC's Peter Okochwe over the health of Ghana's economy when the president granted an interview to the global broadcaster.

abstract:
The National Chairman of the New Patriotic Party (NPP), Mr Stephen Ayesu Ntim, has said the NPP has performed far better than the erstwhile National Democratic Congress (NDC), despite the current global economic challenges facing the country.

He said before the ravaging impact of the COVID-19 pandemic and the Russia-Ukraine war, Ghana's economy was the toast of the world as the country was hailed as among the fastest-growing economies.

"But COVID-19 disrupted the growth momentum of our economy and later the Russia-Ukraine War.

title: PIC, FCDO inaugurates community of practice for Nigeria's digital economy
author: Segun Adeyemi
excerpt: The Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG) and Foreign Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO) has inaugurated a Digital Economy Community of Practice (DECoP)
abstract:
FCT, 
Abuja
 - 
The Policy Innovation Centre (PIC) of the Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG), in collaboration with the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO), launched the Digital Economy Community of Practice (DECoP) to foster inclusive growth across sectors in Nigeria's digital ecosystem.
At the inauguration of the new initiative held at the Transcorp Hilton in Abuja on Thursday, March 30, the CEO of the NESG, Laoye Jaiyeola, said the growth achieved by the digital economy offers great opportunities but also poses the risk of leaving some people behind.

title: UK avoids recession as economy stronger than first thought at end of 2022
author: Larry Elliott
excerpt: GDP rose by 0.1% in final three months of last year despite fears over inflation and financial turmoil
abstract:
Britain's economy grew more than initially thought in late 2022 as a boost from builders, manufacturing and the telecoms sector helped the country avoid a recession.

Despite fears that a combination of high inflation, strikes and financial turmoil would lead to falling output, figures from the Office for National Statistics (ONS) showed gross domestic product rose by 0.1% in the final three months of last year.

The ONS had previously estimated that growth was flat in the fourth quarter but the three main sectors of the economy – services, production and construction – all performed more strongly than previously thought.

title: Virgin Australia sale: Fiji, Bali and more from $429 return
author: Tamika Seeto
excerpt: Virgin Australia has launched its ‘Love Islands sale' with bargain flights to Fiji, Bali, Samoa and Vanuatu.
abstract:
Does relaxing by the beach while sipping a cocktail sound like the perfect holiday for you? Well, now might be time to book, with Virgin Australia slinging cheap return flights to a range of island getaways.
Virgin's Love Islands Sale is running now until midnight on Monday, April 24 unless sold out earlier, with cheap fares on offer to Bali, Fiji, Samoa and Vanuatu.
Deals include Gold Coast to Bali (Denpasar) return from $429, Brisbane to Fiji from $489 return, Melbourne to Vanuatu from $569, and Sydney to Fiji from $469.

title: Taiwan's Financial Industry and the Circular Economy: Innovating for Sustainability
author: Prudour
excerpt: Taiwan's Financial Industry and the Circular Economy: Innovating for Sustainability | 2023-04-19 04:05:10
abstract:
Taiwan's financial industry is taking a leading role in promoting sustainable practices through the circular economy. The circular economy is a sustainable economic model that aims to keep resources in use for as long as possible, minimizing waste and reducing the consumption of finite resources.

In this article, we will explore how Taiwan's financial industry is driving the transition to a circular economy, the benefits of circular economy initiatives, opportunities for businesses, and the challenges that need to be overcome.

title: Virgin Australia announces new sale
author: Amy Sinclair
excerpt: The airline giant has just launched its ‘Love Island Sale' - but you need to get in quick.
abstract:
Virgin Australia
 has launched an epic new sale, offering dirt cheap return flights to a variety of popular island destinations.
The airline's 'Love Island Sale' is currently live, offering heavily discounted fares to overseas locations including Bali, Fiji, Vanuatu and Samoa.
Return flights to from a range of Australian cities to the idyllic destinations start at just $469.
For more Lifestyle related news and videos check out 
Lifestyle >>
Flights on sale include:
Adelaide to Bali (Denpasar) - Economy Lite return from $489
Brisbane to Fiji (Nadi) - Economy Lite return from $489
Brisbane to Samoa (Apia) - Economy Lite return from $549
Brisbane to Vanuatu (Port Vila) - Economy Lite return from $469
Gold Coast to Bali (Denpasar) - Economy Lite return from $429
Melbourne to Fiji (Nadi) - Economy Lite return from $569
Virgin Australia has launched its Love Island Sale.
authors: Amy Sinclair,Digital Staff,Eilidh Mcnaughton,Mike Costello,Sarah Fittock

title: ILO welcomes new UN resolution on social and solidarity economy
excerpt: The United Nations General Assembly has passed a resolution on the social and solidarity economy for sustainable development.
abstract:
© 
ILO
 
GENEVA (ILO News) – ILO Director-General, Gilbert F. Houngbo, has welcomed the new UN Resolution on promoting the social and solidarity economy for sustainable development, passed by the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA). The social and solidarity economy is characterized by voluntary cooperation and mutual aid, democratic and/or participatory governance, and autonomy and independence. Working across economic sectors, social and solidarity economy entities underline the primacy of people and social purpose over capital in the distribution and use of profits and assets.

title: Virgin Australia 'Love Island Sale' offers cheap flights to Bali, Fiji and Vanuatu
author: David Southwell
excerpt: For those already feeling the winter blues Virgin is offering cheap airfares to Pacific island paradises with flights starting from $429 return departing from major capital cities to Bali, Fiji, Samoa…
abstract:
Virgin Australia airlines is offering bargain basement fares for holidaymakers to enjoy getaways to island tropical paradises.
As part of its 'Love Island Sale' Virgin is offering a return fare as low $429 from the Gold Coast to Bali.
Flights departing from Sydney, Adelaide, Brisbane, Melbourne and Perth are also offering knockdown fares to Bali, Fiji, Samoa and Vanuatu.
However, travellers will have be quick because the fares only offer from the airline's website until midnight Monday.
Load Error
The offers apply to selected travel dates, which include May to June 2023, October to December 2023, and January to March 2024.

title: Scaling up circular economy initiatives in Latin America and the Caribbean
author: the Caribbean
excerpt: This document analyses the possibility of scaling up the potential of the circular economy through financial instruments in Latin America and the Caribbean. It reviews progress in the circular economy…
abstract:
This document analyses the possibility of scaling up the potential of the circular economy through financial instruments in Latin America and the Caribbean. It reviews progress in the circular economy in four business cases, selected based on priorities and representativeness for the Latin American and Caribbean region, and assesses the prospect of scaling them up using financial mechanisms and environmental, social and governance (ESG) schemes.


The findings show that investment in circular economy business models has multiple benefits for companies, such as profitable operating margins and improved corporate reputation, thereby lowering the cost of debt and of financing circular economy projects.

title: Singapore Airlines announces special fares for Australia and Texas
author: Kanchan Nath
excerpt: Singapore Airlines announces special limited return fares for travel to various Australian destinations, departing London Heathrow.
abstract:
Singapore Airlines announces special limited return fares for travel to various Australian destinations, departing London Heathrow and Manchester Airport from just £994pp (approx. USD 1,232.98).
 Direct flights from Manchester to Houston, Texas are also included in the offer, starting from just £469pp (approx. USD 581.76).


Available for a limited time only, book now to take advantage of discounted Economy, Premium Economy and Business Class return fares departing from London Heathrow, Manchester and Aberdeen throughout 2023 and into early 2024.

title: Doocy to KJP: 69% Of People Have A Negative View Of The Economy, Why Aren't People Buying Biden's Agenda?
author: Ian Schwartz
excerpt: White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre at Thursday's briefing was asked by FOX News White Ho
abstract:
White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre at Thursday's briefing was asked by FOX News White House correspondent Peter Doocy why people have such a negative outlook on the economy while President Biden touts his economic agenda as successful.

Q Thanks, Karine. Sixty-nine percent of people polled by CNBC say they have a negative view of the economy. President Biden talks about the economy all the time. Why —
MS. JEAN-PIERRE: He talks about — oh.
Q Why aren't people buying it?
MS. JEAN-PIERRE: He talks about the economy all the time because he wants the American people to know that he's doing everything that he can to make sure that he's — that his policies that he's put forward that have shown that he's building an economy that doesn't leave anybody behind; it builds an economy from the bottom up, middle out.

title: 'Night mayor' to help grow and develop Ottawa's nightlife economy
author: Bell Média
excerpt: The city of Ottawa will create the position of a 'night mayor' as part of a new strategy to grow and develop the capital's 'nightlife' economy and shake off the image as the 'town that fun forgot.'
abstract:
The city of Ottawa will create the position of a 'night mayor' as part of a new strategy to grow and develop the capital's 'nightlife' economy and shake off the image as the 'town that fun forgot.'
 
 The proposed new Ottawa Nightlife Economy Action Plan is also proposing the city explore building a 1,500 to 2,000-seat music and event venue to make the city a "destination of choice" for music artists, live entertainment and events requiring a mid-size venue.
 
  A report for the finance and corporate services committee outlines the first three recommendations for the new Ottawa Nightlife Economy Action Plan, which will look to support the 6 p.

title: 4 Out of 5 Americans Say We're In A Recession Or Will Be Within A Year
author: John Carney
excerpt: The majority of Americans say their personal financial situation is getting worse. | Economy
abstract:
The U.S. economy gets poor marks from most Americas, according to a new Harvard CAPS-Harris Poll survey released Friday.


Forty-nine percent of Americans expect the economy will be in a recession in the next year, the poll 
showed
. Another 39 percent say the economy is already in a recession.


Just twenty percent say the economy will avoid a recession.






The numbers are striking because by many measures the economy remains resilient. The unemployment rate is just 3.5 percent and although layoffs have picked up recently, they remain low by historical measures.

title: nirmala sitharaman: FM Nirmala Sitharaman: ‘Methods adopted by western countries during Covid times caused stress economy'
author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
excerpt: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman talks about the western economy during the covid time during an interaction with intellectuals programme organised by Thinkers Forum. FM Sitharaman said the…
abstract:
Apr 23, 2023, 12:50PM IST

Source: TOI.in

Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman talks about the western economy during the covid time during an interaction with intellectuals programme organised by Thinkers Forum. FM Sitharaman said the methods adopted by western countries during Covid times caused stress economy. Their formula to deal with the covid situation - like printing more currency and distribute among people - has now proven hurtful of their economy. FM Sitharaman also said that Covid which followed by Ukraine war further hit everything, which are critical for our economy, badly.

title: Minister Vandal opens public consultation on the Building a Green Prairie Economy Act
author: Ein News
excerpt: PrairiesCan launches a consultation portal for the Building a Green Prairie Economy Act. OTTAWA, ON, April 21, 2023 /CNW/ - On December 15, 2022, the Building a
abstract:
PrairiesCan launches a consultation portal for the Building a Green Prairie Economy Act.

OTTAWA, ON, April 21, 2023 /CNW/ - On December 15, 2022, the Building a Green Prairie Economy Act became law. The Act was the product of the vision and passion of the Honourable Jim Carr, the late Member of Parliament for Winnipeg South Centre who, in everything he did, had the Prairies at heart. At its core, he saw the Act as a new way of doing business – to better focus federal programs on growing regional economies and creating well-paying jobs across the Prairies.

title: Fox's Peter Doocy Confronts Jean-Pierre About Biden's Poor Polling on Economy: ‘Why Aren't People Buying' His Message?
excerpt: Peter Doocy confronted White House Press Secretary Karine Jean Pierre about why Americans were so pessimistic about the economy on Wednesday.
abstract:
Fox News' 
Peter Doocy
 asked White House Press Secretary 
Karine Jean-Pierre
 to explain the divergence between the Biden administration's positive messaging on the economy and Americans' pessimistic view of it during a press conference on Wednesday afternoon.


'69% of people polled by CNBC say they have a negative view of the economy. President Biden talks about the economy all the time. Why aren't people buying it?' inquired 
Doocy
.


Jean-Pierre responded with an explanation of Biden's rhetoric:


He talks about the economy all the time because he wants the American people to know that he's doing everything that he can to make sure that his policies, that he's put forward, that has shown that he's building an economy that doesn't leave anybody behind.

title: A first look inside Emirates' premium economy as it launches in Melbourne
author: Amy Sinclair
excerpt: There are wider seats with extra leg room, gourmet meals and a 13.3-inch sceen. Here is what's included and how much it costs.
abstract:
After eight years in development, 
Emirates
' premium economy cabin has arrived in Melbourne and travellers are already 'trading up' in huge numbers.
On Wednesday, 7NEWS.com.au went on board one of the airline's A380s to tour the new 56-seat cabin and experience the quiet luxury on offer.
WATCH THE VIDEO ABOVE: Exclusive look inside Emirates' new premium economy offering.
For more Travel related news and videos check out 
7Travel >>
The new seats are located at the front of the aircraft on the lower deck and, much like business and first class, is in a separate cabin to economy.
authors: Amy Sinclair,Digital Staff,Jade Credentino,Lucy Mae Beers,Luxury Travel,Pip Christmass,Warren Barnsley

title: Which Airlines Offer The Most Spacious Premium Economy Seats?
author: Justin Hayward
excerpt: Premium economy is popular with many airlines - but which are the best?
abstract:
Premium economy has become popular with many airlines over the past years. More and more airlines have introduced it as a third or fourth cabin on long-haul routes (and some in Asia on shorter regional routes). It has proved itself a cost-effective way to get more space and comfort than the main economy cabin. Today we'll take a look at some of the best offerings.
 
 Why fly premium economy? 


The premium economy product emerged out of the desire to offer more space and an overall better experience for passengers in economy.

title: Interview: Thai central bank official perceives China as stabilizer, driving force for global economy
excerpt: Tourists watch as a live band performs at a street market in Haikou, south China's Hainan Province, Feb. 3, 2023. (Xinhua/Guo Cheng)"The world economy is going through a high inflation period and a…
abstract:
Tourists watch as a live band performs at a street market in Haikou, south China's Hainan Province, Feb. 3, 2023. (Xinhua/Guo Cheng)
"The world economy is going through a high inflation period and a growth slowdown. China has managed to keep inflation quite low while its growth is bouncing back quite rapidly. That's a stabilizing force, beneficial for both the regional and global economy," said Piti Disyatat, assistant governor of the Bank of Thailand.
BANGKOK, April 19 (Xinhua) -- The Chinese economy, rebounding from the COVID-19 pandemic, serves as the stabilizer and driving force for the regional and global economy, a Thailand's central bank senior official has said.

title: China's new COVID policy increases global demand, eases supply chain pressure: report
author: The Star Online
excerpt: HELSINKI, April 20 (Xinhua) -- The optimization of China's COVID-19 response policies increases global demand and eases supply chain restrictions, Finland's Labour Institute for Economic Research…
abstract:
HELSINKI, April 20 (Xinhua) -- The optimization of China's COVID-19 response policies increases global demand and eases supply chain restrictions, Finland's Labour Institute for Economic Research (LABORE) said in its economic forecast for 2023-2025 published on Thursday.
 Most forecasters expect the country's economy to grow sustainably in the coming years following its recent adjustments in its COVID-19 response, the institute said.
 Positive economic development in China increases global demand and eases the pressure on supply chains, thus having a positive effect on the global economy.

title: Pakistan's Informal Economy: Exploring the Risks and Rewards
author: Hamid Zaman
excerpt: Pakistan is a developing country with a population of over 230 million people, and despite efforts to boost its economy, it still faces high levels of inflation. According to the State Bank of Pakistan, inflation reached a 50-year high of 35.4% in March 2023. Inflationary pressures are impacting the purchasing power of ordinary citizens, particularly […]
abstract: Pakistan is a developing country with a population of over 230 million people, and despite efforts to boost its economy, it still faces high levels of inflation. According to the State Bank of Pakistan, inflation reached a 50-year high of 35.4% in March 2023. Inflationary pressures are impacting the purchasing power of ordinary citizens, particularly those in low-income brackets. However, despite these challenges, Pakistan has a thriving shadow economy that plays a significant role in the lives of millions of people.

title: ILO welcomes new UN Resolution on social and solidarity economy for sustainable development
author: ILO
excerpt: The resolution, Promoting the social and solidarity economy for sustainable development , was adopted on April 18, 2023.
abstract:
ILO Director-General, Gilbert F. Houngbo, has welcomed the new UN Resolution on promoting the social and solidarity economy for sustainable development, passed by the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA).
 
The social and solidarity economy is characterized by voluntary cooperation and mutual aid, democratic and/or participatory governance, and autonomy and independence. Working across economic sectors, social and solidarity economy entities underline the primacy of people and social purpose over capital in the distribution and use of profits and assets.

title: Emirates brings A380 premium economy to Melbourne
author: Staff Writers
excerpt: Step onboard with Executive Traveller to explore the Dubai airline's bright and inviting ‘in-between' class.
abstract:
Emirates is continuing the rollout of its new premium economy seats, with a daily Melbourne A380 superjumbo service – specifically flights EK406/EK407 – now offering this ‘more premium than economy' option.


Melbourne joins London, Sydney, Auckland and Christchurch at the forefront of the Gulf carrier's multi-billion dollar upgrade push which will see a staggering 126 aircraft – including the flagship Airbus A380 and Boeing 777 jets – fitted with premium economy.


At the same time, existing first class suites are being refreshed while business class seats will be 'upgraded to a new style and design,' Emirates says.

title: Interview: Thai central bank official perceives China as stabilizer, driving force for global economy
excerpt: BANGKOK, April 19 (Xinhua) -- The Chinese economy, rebounding from the COVID-19 pandemic, serves as the stabilizer and driving force for the regional and global economy, a Thailand's central bank…
abstract:
BANGKOK, April 19 (Xinhua) -- The Chinese economy, rebounding from the COVID-19 pandemic, serves as the stabilizer and driving force for the regional and global economy, a Thailand's central bank senior official has said.
 
Despite a global economic slowdown, mainly driven by advanced economies this year, "Asia becomes the fastest growing region in the world, and China is playing an important part of that," Piti Disyatat, assistant governor of the Bank of Thailand (BOT) said during an exclusive interview with Xinhua.

abstract:
Gross Domestic Product is expected to grow 2.8% by 2026, Economy Ministry projects
The Russian Ministry of Economic Development expects solid growth of the country's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the next three years, due to a partial resumption of consumer demand against the backdrop of rising wages, business daily RBK reported on Monday.
According to the ministry's data, seen by the news outlet, the economy will grow 1.2% this year, following a decline of 2.1% in 2022. Next year, the GDP growth rate will be 2%, accelerating to 2.

title: China's new COVID policy increases global demand, eases supply chain pressure: report
excerpt: HELSINKI, April 20 (Xinhua) -- The optimization of China's COVID-19 response policies increases global demand and eases supply chain restrictions, Finland's Labour Institute for Economic Research…
abstract:
HELSINKI, April 20 (Xinhua) -- The optimization of China's COVID-19 response policies increases global demand and eases supply chain restrictions, Finland's Labour Institute for Economic Research (LABORE) said in its economic forecast for 2023-2025 published on Thursday.
 
Most forecasters expect the country's economy to grow sustainably in the coming years following its recent adjustments in its COVID-19 response, the institute said.
 
Positive economic development in China increases global demand and eases the pressure on supply chains, thus having a positive effect on the global economy.

title: Which Airline Was The First To Introduce A Premium Economy Cabin?
author: Justin Hayward
excerpt: Premium economy is now standard on many long-haul flights - but where did it begin?
abstract:
Premium economy class is a popular choice on many airlines these days. It offers passengers more space and a better seat than economy class but at a more affordable price than business class. More and more airlines are introducing it as a third or fourth cabin on long-haul routes. It was only in the 1990s, though, that the new premium cabin was introduced - first with , but with other airlines soon following.
 
 Offering a "premium" cabin better than economy 


The concept of 
premium economy
 class today is simple - an enhanced offering of economy-style seating with a smaller cabin, more spacious seats, and usually a bit better service.

title: What Is Premium Economy (And When Should You Choose It Over Economy)?
author: Matt Berry
excerpt: Although airlines use different terminology, let's start by differentiating premium economy from "economy plus" (or a similarly termed classification).
abstract:
While it's been around for decades, premium economy seating is still a foreign concept to many travelers. Basically, premium economy is a seat classification between business class and coach in terms of price, perks, and place on the aircraft. As airlines continue introducing creative, new ways to cramp the confines of coach travel — and charge for seemingly everything through unbundled airfare — air carriers have discovered that passengers will pay for upgrades to basic economy.
Although different airlines use different terminology, let's start by differentiating premium economy from "economy plus" (or a similarly termed classification).

title: The informal riddle
author: Adeela Younis
excerpt: Pakistan is the world's 23rd largest economy in terms of GDP based on purchasing power parity . It is classified as a low-income developing economy. The country is also ranked poorly in most...
abstract:
Pakistan is the world's 23rd largest economy in terms of GDP based on purchasing power parity (PPP). It is classified as a low-income developing economy. The country is also ranked poorly in most development indicators set by the UNDP and World Bank.

Over recent decades, there has been no sizable improvement in employment and poverty alleviation in Pakistan. One of the major reasons for this is the massive challenge of the informal economy, whose profits are undocumented and untaxed. As per global economics reports for 2022, the size of Pakistan's informal economy is estimated to be 35.

title: Air India Premium Economy Class: Check Routes, Features, Ticket Price and More
author: Trending Desk
excerpt: Air India Premium Economy Class: Destinations, Amenities, Ticket Costs, and more for Air India's premium economy seats, Latest updates at news18.com
abstract:
Air India is set to provide flyers with a new experience through its Premium Economy class. Starting May 15, the airline will become the only Indian carrier to offer four cabin classes to its consumers– Economy, Premium Economy, 
Business
 and First class. The Premium Economy class will be available on select long-haul flights that will be operated by Air India's fleet of Boeing 777-200LR aircraft between India and the United States.

Air India Premium Economy Class Routes
The facility will be initially available on the Mumbai-New York, Bengaluru-San Francisco and Mumbai-San Francisco routes.

title: Air India to introduce premium economy class in US flights
author: PTI
excerpt: Air India said it has opened sale for the new cabin, for travel starting May 15, 2023, becoming the first and only Indian carrier to offer the choice of four cabin classes.
abstract:
Air India on Friday said it will introduce premium economy class for travel from May 15 in select flights to the US.
 
The premium economy class will initially be available in select flights operated with Boeing 777-200LR aircraft on Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York routes.
 
In a release, the airline said it has 'opened sale for the new cabin, for travel starting May 15, 2023, becoming the first and only Indian carrier to offer the choice of four cabin classes – First, Business, Premium Economy, and Economy'.

title: Politicians advised to mend fences to prevent economic meltdown
author: Express Tribune
excerpt: Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency…
abstract:
Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency likely plunging to Rs500 against the US dollar if the situation persists.
Former prime minister Nawaz Sharif also anticipated late last week that the local currency could slump to Rs500 against the greenback, if the political situation worsens.
Against this backdrop, business leaders demand that all stakeholders end the political deadlock, mend bridges and work towards political unity and stability in a bid to rescue, rehabilitate and revive the economy.

title: Digital economy has a New Global Captain – India
excerpt: India is fast emerging as a leader in the global digital economy. The country's digital economy has grown rapidly over the last few years, thanks to a range of factors, including the contributions of…
abstract: India is fast emerging as a leader in the global digital economy. The country's digital economy has grown rapidly over the last few years, thanks to a range of factors, including the contributions of Narendra Modi, private players, India's technical golden age, digital initiatives of the government, market changes, Make in India, and Digital India programs, and the Indian population's eagerness to adapt quickly. In this article, we will provide a comprehensive analysis of these factors that have enabled India to lead the digital economy globally.

abstract:
KARACHI:



Pakistan's economy has partially shut down and millions of people have lost jobs due to continuous political instability. The nation is destined to encounter hyperinflation with the domestic currency likely plunging to Rs500 against the US dollar if the situation persists.


Former prime minister Nawaz Sharif also anticipated late last week that the local currency could slump to Rs500 against the greenback, if the political situation worsens.


Against this backdrop, business leaders demand that all stakeholders end the political deadlock, mend bridges and work towards political unity and stability in a bid to rescue, rehabilitate and revive the economy.

title: Air India Adds Premium Economy Cabin Class On Select India-United States Flights
author: Zee Media Bureau
excerpt: The Premium Economy will be available to customers travelling on Air India's Boeing 777-200LR aircraft to Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York.
abstract: Air India, the Tata Group airline and former national airline of India has introduced Premium Economy cabin class on its select India-United States international flights. The passengers will be offered a better cabin product, in-flight services, and added on-ground convenience, said Air India. With this, Air India has become the first airline in India to offer four cabin class options to its passengers on international flights, including Economy, Premium Economy, Business and First Class. As per IANS, the Premium Economy will be available to customers travelling on Boeing 777-200LR aircraft to Bengaluru-San Francisco, Mumbai-San Francisco, and Mumbai-New York.

title: UK growth confirms recession avoided in 2022
author: BBC News
excerpt: The economy performed better than previously estimated in the final three months of 2022, new figures show.
abstract:
Image source, 
Getty Images
The UK economy performed better than previously estimated at the end of last year, revised official figures show.
It was previously thought the economy had not grown in the last three months of 2022, but new 
Office for National Statistics data
 shows it grew by 0.1%.
The latest figures confirm that the UK economy avoided falling into recession at the end of 2022.
The ONS said telecommunications, construction and manufacturing had all fared better than initially thought.

title: Circular Economy Week
excerpt: Circular Economy Week 2020, 23–27 May. A themed week of editorial content and events dedicated to supporting sustainability, energy and resource efficiency professionals.
abstract:
Circular Economy Week 2023 (22 – 26 May)
 is edie's themed week of editorial content and events dedicated to supporting sustainability, energy and resource efficiency professionals in accelerating the transition to an economy free from waste and single-use plastics. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Taking place on the afternoon of Thursday 26 May, the Circular Economy Inspiration Sessions offer up an afternoon of live, interactive webinar presentations and discussions – all dedicated to capturing the business opportunity of a resource-efficient, zero-waste economy.

title: Choose your meal, get free gifts on your next Air India travel; Here's how
author: ET Online
excerpt: Air India has Air India introduced a new Premium Economy class for travellers, which offers a superior cabin product, world-class inflight services, and added on-ground convenience. The airline has…
abstract:
31 Mar 2023, 05:37 PM IST
Air India has Air India introduced a new Premium Economy class for travellers, which offers a superior cabin product, world-class inflight services, and added on-ground convenience. The airline has opened sale for the new cabin for travel starting May 15, 2023. With this Air India has become the only Indian carrier to offer four cabin classes: First, Business, Premium Economy, and Economy.
"Air India's Premium Economy offers an exclusive travel experience designed for customers who do not mind paying a reasonable premium over Economy Class fares to fly in style and enjoy a lot more space, comfort, and convenience," the company said in a press release.

title: UK economy grew at the end of last year
author: BBC News
excerpt: The economy performed better than previously estimated in the final three months of 2022, new figures show.
abstract:
Image source, 
Getty Images
The UK economy performed better than previously estimated at the end of last year, revised official figures show.
It was previously thought the economy had not grown in the last three months of 2022, but new 
Office for National Statistics data
 shows it grew by 0.1%.
The latest figures confirm that the UK economy avoided falling into recession at the end of 2022.
The ONS said telecommunications, construction and manufacturing had all fared better than initially thought.

th

title: Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. Board Approves Spin-Off of Traditional Live Entertainment Business
author: Stockhouse Editorial
excerpt: (2023-03-30) Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. Board Approves Spin-Off of Traditional Live Entertainment Business
abstract:
Spin-Off Transaction Expected to be Completed April 20th

Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. (NYSE: MSGE) ('Company') today announced that its board of directors has approved the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment business, which is expected to be completed on April 20th.

Upon completion of the spin-off transaction, the current parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. and will be comprised of the Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality businesses. The newly formed live entertainment company will take on the name Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.

title: Here are all of the WoW Trading Post rewards for April 2023
author: Michael Kelly
excerpt: It's a new month, and a whole new host of rewards are available for purchase.
abstract:
Image via Blizzard Entertainment 








The Trading Post has been restocked for the month of April 2023, and with it, 
WoW: Dragonflight 
players will soon have access to some illustrious rewards. As is quickly becoming tradition with the Trading Post, 
WoW 
players will be able to purchase a new mount, pet, and countless cosmetic items once the calendar flips into April. 
 
This month's Trading Post stock includes some pricey items, including another Cloud Serpent mount and several full-blown transmog sets.

title: MSG Entertainment Finalizes Spinoff Plans
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The live entertainment company will break away from Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality on April 20.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment finalized plans to spin off its live entertainment business, the company announced Thursday (March 30). That will separate the pure-play live music business from MSG Entertainment's state-of-the-art venue in Las Vegas, sports television network and hospitality businesses.
 
 The transaction is expected to be complete on April 20 and is subject to 'certain conditions, approvals, and consents, including final NBA league approval and receipt of a tax opinion from counsel,' according to the company's 
statement
.

title: Madison Square Garden Board Approves Spinoff Plans
author: Etan Vlessing
excerpt: Separating the live entertainment unit, which includes the iconic New York City arena, from other businesses is expected to be completed April 20.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden
 
Entertainment
 Corp. has given final board approval to a spinoff of its traditional live entertainment business, with the transaction expected to be completed April 20.
 
 Once the tax-free separation from the company's other businesses, which include the 
MSG Sphere
 in 
Las Vegas
 and the MSG regional sports networks, is finalized, the parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. 
 
 The rebranded parent will comprise the Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality business, a restaurant group for which MSG
 is exploring a possible sale
.

title: Raúl Alarcón, Ronald Day, Karen Barroeta and Timbaland to Participate in Variety's Second Annual Miami Entertainment Town Event
author: wcinkala
excerpt: Variety announced Thursday the programming for its second annual Miami Entertainment Town lunch, to be held on Thursday, April 13, in Miami. The event, in partnership with CN Bank, celebrates the g…
abstract:
announced Thursday the programming for its second annual Miami Entertainment Town lunch, to be held on Thursday, April 13, in Miami. The event, in partnership with CN Bank, celebrates the growing entertainment and media industry based out of Miami and recognizes those profiled in 
's
 Miami Entertainment Impact Report.
 
 At the celebration, Ronald Day, President of Entertainment and Content Strategy for NBCUniversal Telemundo Enterprises, and Karen Barroeta, Executive Vice President of Production and Development Telemundo Global Studios, will participate in a keynote conversation with Rodrigo Nieto-Galvis, Entertainment Banking Team Leader at CN Bank Miami.

author: Soumya Eswaran
excerpt: Polen Capital, an investment management company, released its 'Polen Global Emerging Markets Growth' fourth quarter 2022 investor letter. A copy of the same can be downloaded here. In the fourth…
abstract: Polen Capital, an investment management company, released its 'Polen Global Emerging Markets Growth' fourth quarter 2022 investor letter. A copy of the same can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, the fund returned 12.96% gross compared to a 9.70% return for the MSCI Emerging Markets Index. Stock selection in the communication services and financial sectors contributed to the fund's performance in the quarter. In addition, please check the fund's top five holdings to know its best picks in 2022.

title: Tencent Music Entertainment Group (NYSE:TME) Shares Sold by Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC
author: MarketBeat
excerpt: Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC cut its position in Tencent Music Entertainment Group (NYSE:TME - Get Rating) by 1.4% in the fourth quarter, according to the company in its most recent 13F…
abstract: Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC cut its position in Tencent Music Entertainment Group (NYSE:TME - Get Rating) by 1.4% in the fourth quarter, according to the company in its most recent 13F filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission. The firm owned 10,965,109 shares of the company's stock after selling 160,989 shares during the quarter. Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC owned approximately 0.65% of Tencent Music Entertainment Group worth $90,791,000 at the end of the most recent quarter.

title: Flutter Entertainment plc (OTCMKTS:PDYPY) Receives Consensus Rating of "Moderate Buy" from Brokerages
author: MarketBeat
excerpt: Flutter Entertainment plc (OTCMKTS:PDYPY - Get Rating) has been given an average recommendation of "Moderate Buy" by the eleven brokerages that are presently covering the firm, Marketbeat.com reports.…
abstract:
Flutter Entertainment plc (OTCMKTS:PDYPY - Get Rating) has been given an average recommendation of "Moderate Buy" by the eleven brokerages that are presently covering the firm, Marketbeat.com reports. One research analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and four have assigned a buy rating to the company. The average 1 year target price among brokers that have issued ratings on the stock in the last year is $15,436.00.

→ Lithium Could Be 2023's Next Big Surprise (From Press Research)

title: MSG board approves spinoff of new Sphere Entertainment company
author: Las Vegas Review-Journal
excerpt: Madison Square Garden Entertainment first considered the spinoff last year. Its $2.2 billion venue in Las Vegas is due to open in September.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment first considered the spinoff last year. Its $2.2 billion venue in Las Vegas is due to open in September.


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.'s board of directors on Thursday approved the spinoff of a company that will oversee the MSG Sphere at The Venetian, MSG Networks and its Tao Group Hospitality businesses.


The new company, to be known as Sphere Entertainment Co., is expected to be formally in play April 20 and will be traded on the New York Stock Exchange with the symbol 'SPHR.

abstract:

Dave & Buster's Entertainment Inc (NASDAQ:PLAY - Get Rating) - Jefferies Financial Group reduced their Q3 2024 earnings per share (EPS) estimates for shares of Dave & Buster's Entertainment in a research note issued on Tuesday, March 28th. Jefferies Financial Group analyst A. Barish now anticipates that the restaurant operator will earn ($0.03) per share for the quarter, down from their prior estimate of $0.09. title: Music Stocks Gain on Strong Week from Spotify, Live Nation, MSG Entertainment
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The 20-company Billboard Global Music Index rose 4.2%, with more than two-thirds of companies in positive territory.
abstract:
‘s Global Music Index rose 4.2% this week to 1,263.70, its high level in six weeks, as 14 of the 20 stocks in the index were in positive territory. The index's most valuable companies were among the gainers: Universal Music Group was up 2.1%, Spotify improved 4.1%, and Live Nation climbed 6.1%.
 
 With additional help from Warner Music Group (+5.9%) and Tencent Music Entertainment (+8.1%), the Global Music Index outperformed the major indexes. The S&P 500 rose 3.5% to 4,109.31 and the Nasdaq composite improved 3.

title: BAFTA Games Awards: Full list of winners as God of War Ragnarök sweeps awards
author: ter
excerpt: Vampire Survivors and Elden Ring were among the winners at the prestigious video game awards
abstract:
The 2023 BAFTA Games Awards were held on Thursday (March 30) at London's Queen Elizabeth Hall on the Southbank. Hosted by Julia Hardy and Inel Tomlinson, the 19th annual Games Awards recognise the most outstanding achievements in gaming from the past year.
 
Action-adventure sequel 
God of War Ragnarök
 was the big winner on the night, taking home five awards from a record breaking 14 nominations, including performance honors and the public voted Game of the Year. Former 
Stargate SG-1
 actor Christopher Judge earned the Best Performance award for his turn as Norse God killer Kratos in the acclaimed video game.

title: Salisbury Arts & Entertainment District Shifts Event Duties to the City
author: Sean Curtis
excerpt: July 1st will see a change in the relationship between the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District and the City of Salisbury.
abstract:
SALISBURY, Md. - July 1st will see a change in the relationship between the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District and the City of Salisbury. 
According to a press release from the Mayor's Office, The City of Salisbury has provided funding to the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District for seven years to contract an executive director to oversee event planning and execution in Downtown Salisbury. Examples of these events include 3rd Fridays, the Friday Night Live Concert Series, and the New Year's Eve Ball Drop.

title: Vampire Survivors beats out Elden Ring and God of War to score Best Game win at BAFTAs
author: Joshua Wolens
excerpt: More like Vampire Thrivers.
abstract:
(Image credit: Stuart Wilson/BAFTA/Getty Images for BAFTA)






Folks, I'm afraid we've gotta hand it to 
the BAFTA Game Awards
 (opens in new tab)
. After a night in which prestigious, expensive Sony titan God of War: Ragnarok swept six awards and Elden Ring took home two, it felt like the Best Game trophy was a dead heat between the pair of them. But the judges went and surprised us, giving it to Vampire Survivors instead.
Vampire Survivors was one of six games that were up for top gong at last night's BAFTAs.

title: New Report: Media & Entertainment Industry Seeks New Revenue Sources as 64% Predict Flat or Lowered Ad Spend
author: Ruba Abdelhadi
excerpt: The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turn
abstract:
The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turned the industry on its head and fundamentally reshaped customer expectations.
 
But as the macro economy enters uncharted waters and consumers reevaluate what's valuable, the industry is under a new level of pressure — and companies will need to fight for every dollar.
 
To offer insight into this changing landscape, Salesforce conducted a survey of 350 media and entertainment decision makers across seven countries for its new Media and Entertainment Industry Insights Report.

title: Kakao Becomes Largest Shareholder of SM Entertainment
excerpt: Meet high-quality contents on KBS WORLD Radio in 11 languages, including news, K-pop, and online Korean-language classes. Also available are programs featuring life, culture, tourism and history of Korea and update news on North Korea.
abstract:
Photo : YONHAP News

South tech giant Kakao Corporation has become the largest shareholder of SM Entertainment after purchasing 35 percent of shares in the K-pop powerhouse through a tender offer.Kakao announced on Tuesday that it, along with its entertainment unit Kakao Entertainment, bought over eight-point-33 million, or 34-point-97 percent of SM shares at 150-thousand won each between March 7 and 26.Having previously held four-point-nine percent of SM shares together, Kakao and its entertainment unit now hold 39-point-87 percent of the company's shares following the public purchase.

title: Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. Board Approves Spin-Off of Traditional Live Entertainment Business
author: Stockhouse Editorial
excerpt: (2023-03-30) Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. Board Approves Spin-Off of Traditional Live Entertainment Business
abstract:
Spin-Off Transaction Expected to be Completed April 20th

Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. (NYSE: MSGE) ('Company') today announced that its board of directors has approved the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment business, which is expected to be completed on April 20th.

Upon completion of the spin-off transaction, the current parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. and will be comprised of the Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality businesses. The newly formed live entertainment company will take on the name Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.

title: MSG Entertainment Finalizes Spinoff Plans
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The live entertainment company will break away from Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality on April 20.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment finalized plans to spin off its live entertainment business, the company announced Thursday (March 30). That will separate the pure-play live music business from MSG Entertainment's state-of-the-art venue in Las Vegas, sports television network and hospitality businesses.
 
 The transaction is expected to be complete on April 20 and is subject to 'certain conditions, approvals, and consents, including final NBA league approval and receipt of a tax opinion from counsel,' according to the company's 
statement
.

title: Madison Square Garden Board Approves Spinoff Plans
author: Etan Vlessing

abstract:
Madison Square Garden
 
Entertainment
 Corp. has given final board approval to a spinoff of its traditional live entertainment business, with the transaction expected to be completed April 20.
 
 Once the tax-free separation from the company's other businesses, which include the 
MSG Sphere
 in 
Las Vegas
 and the MSG regional sports networks, is finalized, the parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. 
 
 The rebranded parent will comprise the Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality business, a restaurant group for which MSG
 is exploring a possible sale
.

abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment first considered the spinoff last year. Its $2.2 billion venue in Las Vegas is due to open in September.


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.'s board of directors on Thursday approved the spinoff of a company that will oversee the MSG Sphere at The Venetian, MSG Networks and its Tao Group Hospitality businesses.


The new company, to be known as Sphere Entertainment Co., is expected to be formally in play April 20 and will be traded on the New York Stock Exchange with the symbol 'SPHR.

title: Music Stocks Gain on Strong Week from Spotify, Live Nation, MSG Entertainment
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The 20-company Billboard Global Music Index rose 4.2%, with more than two-thirds of companies in positive territory.
abstract:
‘s Global Music Index rose 4.2% this week to 1,263.70, its high level in six weeks, as 14 of the 20 stocks in the index were in positive territory. The index's most valuable companies were among the gainers: Universal Music Group was up 2.1%, Spotify improved 4.1%, and Live Nation climbed 6.1%.
 
 With additional help from Warner Music Group (+5.9%) and Tencent Music Entertainment (+8.1%), the Global Music Index outperformed the major indexes. The S&P 500 rose 3.5% to 4,109.31 and the Nasdaq composite improved 3.

title: BAFTA Games Awards: Full list of winners as God of War Ragnarök sweeps awards
author: ter
excerpt: Vampire Survivors and Elden Ring were among the winners at the prestigious video game awards
abstract:
The 2023 BAFTA Games Awards were held on Thursday (March 30) at London's Queen Elizabeth Hall on the Southbank. Hosted by Julia Hardy and Inel Tomlinson, the 19th annual Games Awards recognise the most outstanding achievements in gaming from the past year.
 
Action-adventure sequel 
God of War Ragnarök
 was the big winner on the night, taking home five awards from a record breaking 14 nominations, including performance honors and the public voted Game of the Year. Former 
Stargate SG-1
 actor Christopher Judge earned the Best Performance award for his turn as Norse God killer Kratos in the acclaimed video game.

title: Salisbury Arts & Entertainment District Shifts Event Duties to the City
author: Sean Curtis
excerpt: July 1st will see a change in the relationship between the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District and the City of Salisbury.
abstract:
SALISBURY, Md. - July 1st will see a change in the relationship between the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District and the City of Salisbury. 
According to a press release from the Mayor's Office, The City of Salisbury has provided funding to the Salisbury Arts and Entertainment District for seven years to contract an executive director to oversee event planning and execution in Downtown Salisbury. Examples of these events include 3rd Fridays, the Friday Night Live Concert Series, and the New Year's Eve Ball Drop.

Folks, I'm afraid we've gotta hand it to 
the BAFTA Game Awards
 (opens in new tab)
. After a night in which prestigious, expensive Sony titan God of War: Ragnarok swept six awards and Elden Ring took home two, it felt like the Best Game trophy was a dead heat between the pair of them. But the judges went and surprised us, giving it to Vampire Survivors instead.

title: New Report: Media & Entertainment Industry Seeks New Revenue Sources as 64% Predict Flat or Lowered Ad Spend
author: Ruba Abdelhadi
excerpt: The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turn
abstract:
The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turned the industry on its head and fundamentally reshaped customer expectations.
 
But as the macro economy enters uncharted waters and consumers reevaluate what's valuable, the industry is under a new level of pressure — and companies will need to fight for every dollar.
 
To offer insight into this changing landscape, Salesforce conducted a survey of 350 media and entertainment decision makers across seven countries for its new Media and Entertainment Industry Insights Report.

title: Kakao Becomes Largest Shareholder of SM Entertainment
excerpt: Meet high-quality contents on KBS WORLD Radio in 11 languages, including news, K-pop, and online Korean-language classes. Also available are programs featuring life, culture, tourism and history of Korea and update news on North Korea.
abstract:
Photo : YONHAP News

South tech giant Kakao Corporation has become the largest shareholder of SM Entertainment after purchasing 35 percent of shares in the K-pop powerhouse through a tender offer.Kakao announced on Tuesday that it, along with its entertainment unit Kakao Entertainment, bought over eight-point-33 million, or 34-point-97 percent of SM shares at 150-thousand won each between March 7 and 26.Having previously held four-point-nine percent of SM shares together, Kakao and its entertainment unit now hold 39-point-87 percent of the company's shares following the public purchase.

title: Ron Howard's Imagine Entertainment Sets First-Look Deal with Amazon
author: Wilson Chman
excerpt: IMDb, the world's most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV and celebrity content.
abstract:
31 March 2023
 
by Wilson Chapman
 
 

Indiewire 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 After the release of '
Thirteen Lives
,' Amazon is apparently hoping to stay in business with 
Imagine Entertainment
. 

 has inked a new, multiyear first-look film deal with Imagine Entertainment, the production company co-founded and chaired by 
Ron Howard
 and

Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. (NYSE: MSGE) ('Company') today announced that its board of directors has approved the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment business, which is expected to be completed on April 20th.

title: MSG Entertainment Finalizes Spinoff Plans
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The live entertainment company will break away from Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality on April 20.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment finalized plans to spin off its live entertainment business, the company announced Thursday (March 30). That will separate the pure-play live music business from MSG Entertainment's state-of-the-art venue in Las Vegas, sports television network and hospitality businesses.
 
 The transaction is expected to be complete on April 20 and is subject to 'certain conditions, approvals, and consents, including final NBA league approval and receipt of a tax opinion from counsel,' according to the company's 
statement
.

abstract:
Madison Square Garden
 
Entertainment
 Corp. has given final board approval to a spinoff of its traditional live entertainment business, with the transaction expected to be completed April 20.
 
 Once the tax-free separation from the company's other businesses, which include the 
MSG Sphere
 in 
Las Vegas
 and the MSG regional sports networks, is finalized, the parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. 
 
 The rebranded parent will comprise the Sphere, MSG Networks and Tao Group Hospitality business, a restaurant group for which MSG
 is exploring a possible sale
.

title: Entertainment Gate issues over 11,400 permits since its launch
excerpt: The GEA said in an infographic that the Entertainment Gate issued 361 permits during last March.
abstract:
Saudi Gazette report
RIYADH —
 The General Entertainment Authority (GEA) announced that the total issued permits since the launch of the Entertainment Gate reached to more than 11,400 permits in different activities and events.
The GEA said in an infographic that the Entertainment Gate issued 361 permits during last March.Regarding the various fields of activities for which permits were issued, GEA stated that 122 permits were issued for organizing entertainment activities, and about 100 permits were issued for live displays in restaurants and cafes.

title: Music Stocks Gain on Strong Week from Spotify, Live Nation, MSG Entertainment
author: Glenn Peoples
excerpt: The 20-company Billboard Global Music Index rose 4.2%, with more than two-thirds of companies in positive territory.
abstract:
‘s Global Music Index rose 4.2% this week to 1,263.70, its high level in six weeks, as 14 of the 20 stocks in the index were in positive territory. The index's most valuable companies were among the gainers: Universal Music Group was up 2.1%, Spotify improved 4.1%, and Live Nation climbed 6.1%.
 
 With additional help from Warner Music Group (+5.9%) and Tencent Music Entertainment (+8.1%), the Global Music Index outperformed the major indexes. The S&P 500 rose 3.5% to 4,109.31 and the Nasdaq composite improved 3.

title: BAFTA Games Awards: Full list of winners as God of War Ragnarök sweeps awards
author: ter
excerpt: Vampire Survivors and Elden Ring were among the winners at the prestigious video game awards
abstract:
The 2023 BAFTA Games Awards were held on Thursday (March 30) at London's Queen Elizabeth Hall on the Southbank. Hosted by Julia Hardy and Inel Tomlinson, the 19th annual Games Awards recognise the most outstanding achievements in gaming from the past year.
 
Action-adventure sequel 
God of War Ragnarök
 was the big winner on the night, taking home five awards from a record breaking 14 nominations, including performance honors and the public voted Game of the Year. Former 
Stargate SG-1
 actor Christopher Judge earned the Best Performance award for his turn as Norse God killer Kratos in the acclaimed video game.

) has some inner demons and potential arson to deal with as some of Honey's (
Lisa Kudrow
) therapy group decide to investigate the basement of the house. A special guest voice will be making an appearance in this episode as well, with 
Melanie Lynskey
 (
Yellowjackets

title: Vampire Survivors beats out Elden Ring and God of War to score Best Game win at BAFTAs
author: Joshua Wolens
excerpt: More like Vampire Thrivers.
abstract:
(Image credit: Stuart Wilson/BAFTA/Getty Images for BAFTA)






Folks, I'm afraid we've gotta hand it to 
the BAFTA Game Awards
 (opens in new tab)
. After a night in which prestigious, expensive Sony titan God of War: Ragnarok swept six awards and Elden Ring took home two, it felt like the Best Game trophy was a dead heat between the pair of them. But the judges went and surprised us, giving it to Vampire Survivors instead.
Vampire Survivors was one of six games that were up for top gong at last night's BAFTAs.

title: New Report: Media & Entertainment Industry Seeks New Revenue Sources as 64% Predict Flat or Lowered Ad Spend
author: Ruba Abdelhadi
excerpt: The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turn
abstract:
The media and entertainment industry is constantly changing. The rise of streaming, social media, and subscription models over the past decade have turned the industry on its head and fundamentally reshaped customer expectations.
 
But as the macro economy enters uncharted waters and consumers reevaluate what's valuable, the industry is under a new level of pressure — and companies will need to fight for every dollar.
 
To offer insight into this changing landscape, Salesforce conducted a survey of 350 media and entertainment decision makers across seven countries for its new Media and Entertainment Industry Insights Report.

title: Spinoff company to oversee MSG Sphere, Tao Group, MSG Networks
author: Las Vegas Review-Journal
excerpt: Madison Square Garden Entertainment first considered the spinoff last year. Its $2.2 billion venue in Las Vegas is due to open in September.
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment first considered the spinoff last year. Its $2.2 billion venue in Las Vegas is due to open in September.


 
 
 
 
 
 
Updated March 30, 2023 - 5:40 pm
 
 
Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.'s board of directors on Thursday approved the spinoff of a company that will oversee the MSG Sphere at The Venetian, MSG Networks and its Tao Group Hospitality businesses.


The new company, to be known as Sphere Entertainment Co., is expected to be formally in play April 20 and will be traded on the New York Stock Exchange with the symbol 'SPHR.

title: Imagine Entertainment switches from Apple to Amazon
author: Samantha Wiley
excerpt: Studio Imagine Entertainment was reported to move from Apple to Amazon Studios for its first-look deals. The Hollywood Reporter said that Imagine ...
abstract:
Studio Imagine Entertainment was reported to move from Apple to Amazon Studios for its first-look deals.


The 
Hollywood
 Reporter said that Imagine Entertainment has switched its first-look deal from Apple TV+ to Amazon Studios. In 2021, the company signed a deal with Apple to produce content for Apple's streaming platform. Imagine produced ‘Black & Blues: The Colorful Ballad of Louis Armstrong' for Apple, but as an Amazon partner, Imagine will have a slew of documentaries and films.


Amazon and Imagine Entertainment have collaborated on a few content, which includes ‘Judy Blume Forever', ‘Lucy and Desi', and ‘Thirteen Lives'.

title: Madison Square Garden Entertainment splitting into two companies
author: Jarah Wright
excerpt: After April 20, the current parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. and manage several Las Vegas properties
abstract:
LAS VEGAS (KTNV) — A new spin-off company from Madison Square Garden Entertainment is set to manage several properties here in Las Vegas.
On Thursday, the company said its board of directors has approved the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment business.
Once that transaction is complete, the current parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment Co. and will include the MSG Sphere, MSG Networks, and Tao Group Hospitality businesses.
Meantime, the newly-formed live entertainment company will be named Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp.

title: SM Entertainment HQ raided by regulators over suspected stock manipulation in Kakao's takeover
excerpt: This comes amid speculations that Kakao manipulated stock prices when acquiring shares of SM Entertainment. Read more at straitstimes.com.
abstract:
The headquarters of K-pop powerhouse SM Entertainment was raided by South Korea's financial regulators on Tuesday. 


This came amid speculations that South Korea's Internet giant Kakao had manipulated stock prices in the process of 
acquiring more shares of SM Entertainment, 
reported Yonhap on Tuesday, citing sources.


As part of the probe, the Financial Supervisory Service (FSS) also raided offices of Kakao and its entertainment unit, Kakao Entertainment earlier this month. 
 
The FSS has been investigating the allegations after SM Entertainment's rival Hybe, the management agency behind K-pop supergroup BTS, filed a petition for a probe with the authority in February.

title: How much does Valorant's Radiant Entertainment System cost?
author: Kushal Bhattacharyya
excerpt: Valorant is set to release its new skin collection with Episode 6 Act 3.
abstract:
Valorant is set to release its new skin collection with Episode 6 Act 3. The Radiant Entertainment System is an upcoming bundle that encompasses the theme of classic arcade video game platforms with nostalgic sound and visual effects. Every 90's kid will immediately recognize the telltale sound of the arcade machine beeping and its classic design that shares its resemblance to the old system. Riot did not shy away from bringing forth one of the most unique collections to Valorant.

The Radiant Entertainment system is set to be released on April 25, 2023, after the Episode 6 Act 3 Patch has been deployed for the upcoming season.

title: Greenberg Traurig Elevates 4 Entertainment & Media Practice Attorneys
author: Alana C. Kirkland
excerpt: Global law firm Greenberg Traurig, LLP elevated three attorneys to shareholder in its Entertainment & Media Practice: Ann Brigid Clark, Paul Sarker, and Jared S. Welsh. Alana C. Kirkland was elevated to of
abstract:
Global law firm Greenberg Traurig, LLP elevated three attorneys to shareholder in its Entertainment & Media Practice: Ann Brigid Clark, Paul Sarker, and Jared S. Welsh. Alana C. Kirkland was elevated to of counsel.

"Our entertainment practice is broad and interdisciplinary, which is why Ann, Paul, Jared, and Alana were elevated – they have all developed specific talents at Greenberg Traurig, which in turn create multifaceted offerings for our clients," said Bobby Rosenbloum, chair of the firm's global Entertainment & Media Practice.

title: Sphere Entertainment Co. Completes Spin-Off of Traditional Live Entertainment Businesses
author: Business Wire
excerpt: Sphere Entertainment Co. (NYSE: SPHR) (the 'Company' or 'Sphere Entertainment') today announced that it has completed the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment businesses and changed its name…
abstract:
Sphere Entertainment Co. (NYSE: SPHR) (the 'Company' or 'Sphere Entertainment') today announced that it has completed the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment businesses and changed its
 name from Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. to Sphere Entertainment Co. and will begin trading today on the NYSE under the new ticker symbol 'SPHR.' The newly-formed live entertainment
 company, which will take on the name Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. ('MSG Entertainment'), will begin trading today on the NYSE under the ticker symbol 'MSGE.

title: Live Nation Entertainment Schedules First Quarter 2023 Earnings Release And Teleconference
author: PR Newswire
excerpt: Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE: LYV), the world's leading live entertainment company, will release its first quarter financial results after market hours on Thursday, May 4, 2023. Michael…
abstract:
LOS ANGELES, April 20, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE: LYV), the world's leading live entertainment company, will release its first quarter financial results after market hours on Thursday, May 4, 2023. Michael Rapino, Live Nation Entertainment's President and Chief Executive Officer, will host a teleconference that day at 2:00 p.m. PT (5:00 p.m. ET) to discuss the company's financial performance, operational outlook, and other forward-looking matters.
A live webcast of the call will be accessible from the "News / Events" section of the company's website at investors.

title: Greenberg Traurig Elevates 4 Entertainment & Media Practice Attorneys
author: Benzinga
excerpt: Global law firm Greenberg Traurig, LLP elevated three attorneys to shareholder in its Entertainment & Media Practice: Ann Brigid Clark, Paul Sarker, and Jared
abstract:
Global law firm Greenberg Traurig, LLP elevated three attorneys to shareholder in its Entertainment & Media Practice: Ann Brigid Clark, Paul Sarker, and Jared S. Welsh. Alana C. Kirkland was elevated to of counsel.

LOS ANGELES, April 20, 2023 /PRNewswire-PRWeb/ -- Global law firm Greenberg Traurig, LLP elevated three attorneys to shareholder in its Entertainment & Media Practice: Ann Brigid Clark, Paul Sarker, and Jared S. Welsh. Alana C. Kirkland was elevated to of counsel.

"Our entertainment practice is broad and interdisciplinary, which is why Ann, Paul, Jared, and Alana were elevated – they have all developed specific talents at Greenberg Traurig, which in turn create multifaceted offerings for our clients," said Bobby Rosenbloum, chair of the firm's global Entertainment & Media Practice.

title: Madison Square Garden Entertainment board approves spin-off of traditional live entertainm
author: Khyathi Dalal
excerpt: Madison Square Garden Entertainment (MSGE) board approved the spin-off of its traditional live entertainment business, which is expected to be completed on Apr.20.On completion of...
abstract:
Madison Square Garden Entertainment (
NYSE:
MSGE
) board approved the 
spin-off
 of its traditional live entertainment business, which is expected to be completed on Apr.20.
 
On completion of the transaction, the current parent company will be renamed Sphere Entertainment and will consist of Sphere, MSG
 Networks and Tao Group Hospitality businesses.
 
 
The newly formed live entertainment company will take on the name Madison Square Garden Entertainment and will include a diverse collection of performance venues, the entertainment and sports bookings business.
