title: Crime Stoppers needs help identifying a breaking & entering suspect
author: Wftx Digital Team
excerpt: Southwest Florida Crime Stoppers is looking for a suspect accused of breaking and entering & robbery.
abstract:
Posted at
 1:35 PM, Apr 24, 2023 
 
 
LEE COUNTY, Fla. — Southwest Florida Crime Stoppers is looking for a suspect accused of breaking and entering & robbery. 
According to Crime Stoppers, the suspect used a sledgehammer to enter the R&B Arcade on Gunnery Road in Lehigh Acres. 
Crime Stoppers says they broke a window and stole a safe with an undisclosed amount of cash. 
Anyone with information is urged to call Crime Stoppers at 1-800-780-TIPS w/ info.
 
SUSPECT GAINED ENTRY INTO BUSINESS W/ SLEDGE HAMMER
This suspect used a sledge hammer at 5:53 a.

title: NYC Crime Is Not Worst Ever, Despite Claims
author: Philip Marcelo
excerpt: Following Monday's congressional hearing on violent crime in New York City, claims spread across social media that the bad old days are back in the nation's largest city. Conservatives and other users…
abstract:
Following Monday's congressional hearing on violent crime in City, claims spread across social media that the bad old days are back in the nation's largest city.
Conservatives and other users widely shared a video clip of City Councilman Robert Holden, who testified at the special hearing in Manhattan that he's 'never seen the lawlessness' he's seen today in his lifetime.
But experts and city officials say crime across the five boroughs is nowhere near the levels seen in the 1990s, and while there was a rise in 2022, those figures are already trending down this year.

title: State agency reminds victims crime scene cleanup expenses may be covered under fund
author: Kara Kenney
excerpt: The Indiana Criminal Justice Institute is reminding crime victims throughout the state they may be eligible for compensation through the state's Victim Compensation Program.
abstract:
INDIANAPOLIS — The Indiana Criminal Justice Institute is reminding crime victims throughout the state they may be eligible for compensation through the state's Victim Compensation Program.
National Crime Victims' Rights Week is from April 23-29.
In 2022, the Indiana General Assembly passed 
legislation
that expanded the list of expenses eligible for compensation to include crime scene cleanup and the replacement of windows or door locks.
In March, WRTV Investigates told you about the murder of Eric Cavanaugh in Columbus.

title: Police: data shows violent crime in Springfield is on the decline
author: Glenn Kittle
excerpt: Western Mass News is getting answers on violent crime in Springfield as we mark the last week of April. Fortunately, the news is encouraging.
abstract:
SPRINGFIELD, Mass. (WGGB/WSHM) - Western Mass News is getting answers on violent crime in Springfield as we mark the last week of April. Fortunately, the news is encouraging.
According to data from the Springfield Police Department, violent crime decreased by 30% in the city over a 10 year period from 2010 until 2020. The new data also suggests that crime is back on the decline in 2023.
Western Mass News has reported on 4 incidents of gun violence and 1 stabbing over the past month. However, despite this, Springfield Police Spokesperson Ryan Walsh told Western Mass News that violent crime in Springfield is down on the year.

title: What Happened Right After D.C. Councilman Claimed There Is No Crime Crisis
author: Julio Rosas
abstract:
Shortly after Washington, D.C. City Council Chairman Phil Mendelson (D) testified to Congress on Wednesday the area is not experiencing a crime wave, a double shooting took place that resulted in a juvenile being injured.
 
Mendelson said while how people feel about public safety is important, there is no major crime problem in the nation's capital.
"When it comes to crime how people feel is important and some residents don't feel safe. But the number of violent crime incidents in 2022 was 45 percent lower than a decade ago, total violent crime last year was 7% less than the year before.

title: McGruff the Crime Dog® launches limited-edition Barking Beauty Dog Shampoo
author: PR Newswire
excerpt: The National Crime Prevention Council and McGruff the Crime Dog® launch a new dog shampoo beauty line, "Barking Beauty".
abstract:
The iconic crime dog shares his beauty secrets with the world
WASHINGTON, April 1, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The National Crime Prevention Council and McGruff the Crime Dog® launch a new dog shampoo beauty line, "Barking Beauty".
The limited-edition shampoo line uses real, ethically made ingredients, to make even the unruliest dogs shine as bright as the crime dog himself. McGruff is releasing four different scents as part of his breakthrough in the beauty world.
"We keep hearing it. Everyone wants McGruff back," said Paul DelPonte, Executive Director at the National Crime Prevention Council.

title: Reappointment to Fight Crime Committee announced
excerpt: The Government announced today (March 31) the reappointment of Ms Cecilia Ho Chung-chee as a member of the Fight Crime Committee. Her term of appointment is from April 1, 2023, to March...
abstract:
Reappointment to Fight Crime Committee announced
 
 
Reappointment to Fight Crime Committee announced
 
 
************************************************
 
 
      The Government announced today (March 31) the reappointment of Ms Cecilia Ho Chung-chee as a member of the Fight Crime Committee. Her term of appointment is from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025.        The Chief Secretary for Administration and Chairman of the Committee, Mr Chan Kwok-ki, expressed gratitude to Ms Ho for her acceptance of the reappointment and the valuable advice she offered to the Fight Crime Committee during her tenure in the past two years.

title: DC denies crime crisis amid notable uptick
author: Brady Knox
excerpt: Washington, D.C., leaders denied the existence of a "crime crisis" in front of Congress despite a recent increase in crime.
abstract:
Washington, D.C., leaders denied the existence of a "crime crisis" in front of Congress despite a recent increase in crime.

In a House Oversight Committee hearing, Chairman James Comer (R-KY) grilled D.C. Council Chairman Phil Mendelson and Councilman Charles Allen, both Democrats, over a recent increase in several violent crimes, including carjackings and homicides. Mendelson and Allen denied there was a crisis but acknowledged some concern.

'Radical left-wing policies have led to a crime crisis,' Comer said, Yahoo News reported.

title: Trump ally complaints aside, crime is down in Manhattan
author: Philip Bump
excerpt: A common attack on the indictment of Trump is that the district attorney should focus on other crime. Serious crimes are down in Manhattan.
abstract:
Listen 3 min Comment on this story Comment Gift Article Share

Ever since murmurs of a potential indictment of Donald Trump first began, he and his allies have offered a slew of arguments against the idea. They argued that such an action, despite the evidence against the former president, would be an unacceptable political act. They insisted that it was simply an extension of the left's long-standing crusade against him. And, tying in a common theme from last year's midterm elections, they goggled at the priorities of the Manhattan district attorney as New York was overrun with crime.

title: New economic crime clampdown `just smoke and mirrors´
author: PA Media
excerpt: The Economic Crime Plan 2, which had been originally set for launch last year, will see an extra 475 new financial crime investigators recruited.
abstract:
Published:
 
 10:03 EDT, 30 March 2023 
 
 | 
 
Updated:
 
 10:03 EDT, 30 March 2023 
 
 
 
The Government has a launched a new three-year plan to crack down on money laundering and economic crime.
 
However, it has faced accusations by opposition MPs that the delayed strategy is 'just smoke and mirrors' and lacks necessary resources.
 
The Royal United Services Institute (RUSI) also said plans to grow the police force dealing with economic crime were still 'not enough to stem a multi-jurisdictional, multi-billion pound threat'.

title: Houston crime victims head to state capitol to demand public safety, victim support
author: Erica Ponder
excerpt: Houston-area crime victims are calling for policies that address trauma, support victims, and tackle the root causes of crime.
abstract:
AUSTIN
 – Houston-area crime victims are calling for policies that address trauma, support victims, and tackle the root causes of crime.
Dozens of Houston crime victims boarded buses at Wheeler Avenue Baptist Church and traveled to the state capitol, where they will join more than 100 fellow crime survivors and families of murder victims from across the state for the first-ever 'Survivors Speak Texas' event.
'Survivors Speak Texas' was organized by Crime Survivors for Safety and Justice. During a news conference, they will urge lawmakers to fund the state's first Trauma Recovery Center and pass reforms they say will help break cycles of crime.

title: Revealed: The most crime hit streets of Worcester
author: Sam Greenway
excerpt: The roads most impacted by crime in Worcester have been revealed.
abstract:
© Provided by Worcester News
 STREETS: The most crime hit streets in Worcester (Image: Google/ West Mercia Police)
THE most crime-hit residential streets in Worcester can be revealed.
As previously reported there were 1,147 crimes reported across the city in January - the latest month of data made available.
The data has been released by West Mercia Police revealing the number of the types of crime reported, as well as their location.
Breaking down the data by street reveals the most crime-hit residential street in Worcester in January was Gresham Road in Dines Green, with 13 reports.

title: Crime rates have more to do with social factors than number of police officers
author: John Sewell
excerpt: Evidence suggests that rates of crime have nothing whatsoever to do with the number of police officers. It uses the term 'severe crime' as something which involves a prison sentence to differentiate it from lesser crimes. In Winnipeg there are 184 officers for every 100,000 residents and the rate of severe crime is 113 persons for every 100,000 residents.
abstract:
One pervasive urban myth is that more police officers will mean there will be less crime.

Premier Doug Ford embraced this myth as his response to recent violent incidents on the TTC, stating we need more police officers in Toronto to deal with these incidents. But there is no evidence to support this statement. Evidence suggests that rates of crime have nothing whatsoever to do with the number of police officers.

Here's the data from Statistics Canada, which compiles the data supplied by police across the country.

title: DC Official Claims Crime 'Is Not' a Crisis After Rand Paul Staffer Stabbing
author: Wendell Husebø
excerpt: Washington, DC, Councilman Phil Mendelson testified before Congress on Wednesday that the soaring crime rate in the District is not a crisis.
abstract:
Days after Sen. Rand Paul's (R-KY) staffer was brutally stabbed over the weekend, Washington, DC, Council Chairman Phil Mendelson testified before Congress on Wednesday that the soaring crime rate in the district is not a crisis.


Overall crime has soared across the district by 22 percent since 2022, D.C. crime 
statistics
 from Wednesday show. Sex abuse is up 110 percent. Homicides are up 19 percent. Property crime is up 27 percent, and motor vehicle theft has soared 108 percent.






Mendelson 
dismissed
 soaring crime statistics by claiming before House Oversight Committee, 'There is not a crime crisis in Washington, DC.

title: Trump's the ham sandwich in Bragg's Banana Republic
author: Charles Hurt
excerpt: Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg wants you to know that he takes 'white-collar crime' very, very seriously.
abstract:
Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg wants you to know that he takes 'white-collar crime' very, very seriously.

'True and accurate business records are important everywhere, to be sure. They are all the more important in Manhattan — the financial center of the world,' he said this week. 'That is why we have a history in the Manhattan DA's office of vigorously enforcing white-collar crime.'

Mr. Bragg is so serious about taking 'white-collar crime' very, very seriously that he has charged former President Donald Trump with 34 counts of 'white collar crime.

title: The Safest City In Michigan
author: Logan DeLoye
excerpt: Safe Wise put together a list of the safest places to live in each state. | iHeart
abstract:
Safety is a very important factor to consider when traveling or moving to a new city. Wether you have a family or are traveling solo, the peace of mind that comes with feeling safe should be a priority. Some places across Michigan are known for being safer than others. One town in particular boasts the lowest crime rate in the entire state. Though there are many safe areas to live in Michigan only one can be the safest!

According to a list compiled by SafeWise, the safest place to live in Michigan is Addison Township.

title: DC leaders grilled on crime by GOP at congressional hearings
author: Tom Fitzgerald
excerpt: Top D.C. government officials faced a grilling from House Republicans Wednesday over crime in the District.
abstract:
WASHINGTON
 - 
Top D.C. government officials faced a grilling from House Republicans Wednesday over crime in the District. 
 
Congress is increasing pressure on D.C to stop violent crime, especially after a 
Senate staffer was stabbed
 earlier this week and a 
Congresswoman was attacked inside her apartment building
 last month. 
 
Wednesday's House Oversight Committee hearing looked at not only increasing crime, but local laws that the GOP says are making the problem worse.  
 
"Radical left-wing policies have led to a crime crisis," says Republican Chairman James Comer.

title: Unexplained wealth orders crack down on organized crime
author: Ein News
excerpt: CANADA, March 30 - The B.C. government is targeting organized crime by creating a new suite of tools to seize proceeds of crime, such as fast cars, glamourous
abstract:
CANADA, March 30 - The B.C. government is targeting organized crime by creating a new suite of tools to seize proceeds of crime, such as fast cars, glamourous homes and luxury goods, making gang life unprofitable.

Government is making a number of amendments to the Civil Forfeiture Act, including the creation of unexplained wealth orders (UWOs). These orders will require people to explain how they acquired their assets if there is suspicion of unlawful activity. They are a powerful tool that will help the government pierce common money-laundering techniques, such as hiding assets with family members or associates, and removing the benefits of organized crime.

title: Whitehaven officer shooting interrupts Memphis crime summit
author: Rya Wooten
excerpt: Councilmembers and local law enforcement organized the Memphis crime summit to discuss ways to decrease crime in the city.
abstract:
Memphis city councilmembers, local and state officials, and Memphis law enforcement all met Thursday night to discuss ways to decrease crime.
Ironically, at the same time that leaders gathered at First Baptist Church on Broad Ave. sharing ways to better manage increasing crime in the city, two Memphis police officers were shot while responding to an armed person call in Whitehaven near the 1200 block of East Raines Rd.
Load Error
Both officers and the suspect were transported to Regional One Hospital in critical condition.

title: McGruff the Crime Dog® launches limited-edition Barking Beauty Dog Shampoo
excerpt: The iconic crime dog shares his beauty secrets with the world WASHINGTON, April 1, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The National Crime Prevention Council and McGruff the
abstract:
The iconic crime dog shares his beauty secrets with the world 


WASHINGTON
, 
April 1, 2023
 /PRNewswire/ -- The National Crime Prevention Council and McGruff the Crime Dog
®
 launch a new dog shampoo beauty line, "Barking Beauty".
 
The limited-edition shampoo line uses real, ethically made ingredients, to make even the unruliest dogs shine as bright as the crime dog himself. McGruff is releasing four different scents as part of his breakthrough in the beauty world.


"We keep hearing it. Everyone wants McGruff back," said 
Paul DelPonte
, Executive Director at the National Crime Prevention Council.

title: State of Missouri to observe National Crime Victims' Rights Week with Capitol ceremony on Thursday, April 27
author: Missouri Department
excerpt: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE March 30, 2023 State of Missouri to observe National Crime Victims' Rights Week with Capitol ceremony on Thursday, April 27 Governor Mike
abstract:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
March 30, 2023

State of Missouri to observe National Crime Victims' Rights Week with Capitol ceremony on Thursday, April 27

Governor Mike Parson has proclaimed April 23-29 as Crime Victims' Rights Week in Missouri, which coincides with National Crime Victims' Rights Week. This year, Missouri Attorney General Andrew Bailey will be the keynote speaker at the annual observation hosted by the Missouri Department of Public Safety Office for Victims of Crime. The event, which also includes displays, information and representatives of victim service organizations, will be held on April 27 at noon on the south steps of the Capitol.

title: To battle nationwide violent crime, a former Trump official looks to Dallas for answers
author: Sarah Bahari
excerpt: As crime ticked upward in some U.S. cities, Dallas bucked that trend. Why?
abstract:
For the past three years, crimes rates in some U.S. cities appeared bleak: Rates of homicides and shootings, long on the decline, ticked upward.

Police in Dallas, however, reported a drop in murders and violent crime in both 2021 and 2022.

'What's the secret sauce?' asked Ja'Ron Smith, head of the nonprofit Public Safety Solutions for America, which hosted a panel Thursday in Dallas to address public safety. Co-hosts included the conservative thinktanks Americans for Prosperity and Right on Crime.

title: Do You Actively Avoid Consuming True Crime Content? If So, I Need To Know Why!
author: Juliette Perks
excerpt: If you avoided the Jeffrey Dahmer documentary and other true crime content, I need the deets.
abstract:
Over the years, True Crime content seems to be more of a thing.

Whether it's the latest Netflix show on serial killers like Jeffrey Dahmer or Ted Bundy, or it's a popular podcast or youtube account dedicated to recounting the chilling events of past crimes...or maybe it's an entire book dedicated to school shootings (like Columbine), it's safe to say, there is a LOT of accessible content about true crime.

Some of us are happy to delve right into the deets (you should see my goodreads).

I personally engage with a fair bit of true crime content because as horrifying as it is, it is a part of the world we live in, so I can't help but want to know more than the brief news clips we may get shown about something.

title: UK Unveils Plan to Lead Fight Against Economic Crime
author: Mirage News
excerpt: Corrupt elites and criminal gangs who abuse our financial system will be identified and stripped of their cash through a new plan to tackle economic
abstract:
Corrupt elites and criminal gangs who abuse our financial system will be identified and stripped of their cash through a new plan to tackle economic crime.

The Economic Crime Plan 2 builds on the foundations of its predecessor with new actions to improve the system-wide response to economic crime through enhanced cooperation between government, law enforcement, supervisory agencies and the private sector.

Our response to economic crime will be bolstered by 475 new highly trained financial crime investigators, spread across intelligence, enforcement and asset recovery at key agencies.

title: Crime report shows Colorado No. 1 for violent crime and many victims aren't reporting
author: Shaun Boyd
excerpt: A newly released report by the Department of Justice finds Colorado has the highest rate of violent crime victimizations in the country - more than twice the national average.
abstract:
A newly released report by the Department of Justice finds Colorado has the highest rate of violent crime victimizations in the country - more than twice the national average. And the state is number two in property crime victimizations.

The data was collected between 2017 and 2019, before COVID, but crime has only gotten worse since then.

What makes the report different from other crime statistics is that, for the first time, it includes a survey of people who say they were victims of crime but didn't report it to the police.

title: Watch: DC Council Chair Claims 'There Is No Crime Crisis,' It Backfires Almost Immediately
author: Sister Toldjah
excerpt: Crime continues to be a problem for Democrats, and this guy just made it worse.
abstract:
Democrats and their media allies have been 
gaslighting the hell
 out of the American people for years now about the 
crime crisis
 (and their response to it) going on in Democrat-run cities in this country.
 
But a statement made by D.C Council Chair Phil Mendelson (D) about the crime problems plaguing our nation's capital city during a Congressional hearing on Wednesday just might take the cake as the Political Gaslighting Moment of All Time – especially considering what happened not long after Mendelson made the incredible claim.

title: Ontario's travel regulator finds strong consumer intention to travel this spring and summer, despite concerns about travel complexity
author: CNW Group
excerpt: Nearly 7-in-10 Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer, while 2-in-3 are concerned about having their travel plans delayed or cancelled.MISSISSAUGA, ON, March 29, 2023 /CNW/ - New research…
abstract:
Nearly 7-in-10 Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer, while 2-in-3 are concerned about having their travel plans delayed or cancelled.
MISSISSAUGA, ON, March 29, 2023 /CNW/ - New research from the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO) confirms a strong intention by Ontarians to travel this spring and summer. According to a survey of 1,200 Ontarians, 68% of survey respondents intend to travel within Ontario, 51% intend to journey across Canada, while 47% intend to pack their bags for an international trip.

It's no wonder travelers are taking extra precautions as they plan their summer travel. So what's the best way to protect the travel bookings you've made? Protect Your Trip Investment

title: Importance of Travel Tips Traveling to a new place can be a daunting experience, especially for someone who hasn't visited the place before. Knowing the best ways to travel and reliable places to eat and socialize can make one's trip stress-free. However, finding unique activities and hidden gems can be a challenge, especially when searching online. Hamiczech's Extensive Blog and Travel Experiences Hamiczech is a travel blogger and influencer who has traveled extensively to various countries, including Austria, Croatia, Italy, Spain, Turkey, and the United Arab Emirates, among others. She is an avid explorer who has tried various activities and restaurants. Hamiczech fearlessly explores the world, from skiing to visiting castles to going deep into caves. Her experiences and honest reviews of hotels, restaurants and activities are an excellent resource for travelers who want to know all the details about a place. Find the Best Travel Tips with Hamiczech Hamiczech doesn't just travel to tourist destinations that many people have been to before. She actively seeks unique places and activities to find hidden gems that no other travel blogger has talked about. If travelers want to create unforgettable memories that last a lifetime, Hamiczech's blog is the perfect resource to find the best travel tips and tricks.

abstract:
Say Goodbye to Travel Stress and Wave Hello to DODOBOT AI, the first Mauritian AI travel assistant that provides personalized recommendations, insider tips, and so much more about travel within the Island.

 is proud to introduce the first-ever AI travel assistant in Mauritius, DodoBot AI. abstract:
Should I stay or should I go?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
According to a new study
 by the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO), nearly 70% of Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer but 65% are still concerned about having their plans delayed or cancelled.
 
The poll shows that 68% intend to travel within the province, 51% within Canada and 47% intend to go on an international trip.
 
The study also shows that 71% feel that travel is more complicated now than it was prior to the start of COVID-19 with 60% saying that being stranded from home is a concern.

excerpt: Travel policy offers far more value than just coverage for potential trip cancellation, delay, interruption, medical expenses, and lost luggage.
abstract:

travel insurance
 is a good idea.
 
The key factors behind people not buying travel insurance are the inconvenience of the process and their lack of time. However, due to the increasing frequency of travel-related issues, the post-pandemic emphasis on safety, and the growing trend of travelling long distances, travel insurance is now becoming a crucial priority for many.

title: Can Americans Travel to Cuba? [2023 Update]
author: Carley Rojas Avila
excerpt: We're frequently asked - can Americans travel to Cuba? YES! In this guide to American travel to Cuba, learn how EASY US travel to Cuba can be.
abstract:
"Can Americans travel to Cuba?" is one of the most frequent questions we receive on this website. Take it from an American citizen who travels to Cuba all the time - American travel to Cuba is easier than ever.
Despite what many Americans believe to be a full Cuba travel ban, there are many ways to legally travel to Cuba for American citizens. In fact, traveling to Cuba is quite easy.
While Americans traveling to Cuba need to be aware of certain restrictions that the U.S. government imposes on its own citizens' travel plans in Cuba, Cuba is NOT off-limits to Americans!
In this ultimate guide to Cuba travel for Americans, we're including all the details you'll need to know to plan your trip to Cuba, plus answering some of the most common questions about Cuba travel safety, travel, and more.

title: 68% of Ontarians plan to travel this spring-summer: Survey
author: Jane Stevenson
excerpt: Should I stay or should I go? This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below. According to a new study by the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO), nearly 70% of…
abstract:
Should I stay or should I go?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
According to a new study
 by the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO), nearly 70% of Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer but 65% are still concerned about having their plans delayed or cancelled.
 
The poll shows that 68% intend to travel within the province, 51% within Canada and 47% intend to go on an international trip.
 
The study also shows that 71% feel that travel is more complicated now than it was prior to the start of COVID-19 with 60% saying that being stranded from home is a concern.

title: Is travel insurance worth it?
author: Meghna Maharishi
excerpt: Here's everything you need to know about travel insurance and whether you should purchase it for your next trip.
abstract:
You've spent weeks meticulously 
planning your vacation
 — everything from airfare and hotels to an itinerary. However, what do you do when something unexpected occurs and suddenly you can't take your trip?
Some purchase travel insurance. It can help you potentially avoid losing the thousands of dollars you spent on your vacation.
But when is travel insurance worth buying?
Here's everything you need to know about travel insurance so you can decide if you should purchase a policy for your next trip.

title: Importance of Travel Tips Traveling to a new place can be a daunting experience, especially for someone who hasn't visited the place before. She is an avid explorer who has tried various activities and restaurants. Hamiczech fearlessly explores the world, from skiing to visiting castles to going deep into caves. Her experiences and honest reviews of hotels, restaurants and activities are an excellent resource for travelers who want to know all the details about a place. Find the Best Travel Tips with Hamiczech Hamiczech doesn't just travel to tourist destinations that many people have been to before. She actively seeks unique places and activities to find hidden gems that no other travel blogger has talked about. If travelers want to create unforgettable memories that last a lifetime, Hamiczech's blog is the perfect resource to find the best travel tips and tricks.

travel insurance

title: Can Americans Travel to Cuba? [2023 Update]
author: Carley Rojas Avila
excerpt: We're frequently asked - can Americans travel to Cuba? YES! In this guide to American travel to Cuba, learn how EASY US travel to Cuba can be.
abstract:
"Can Americans travel to Cuba?" is one of the most frequent questions we receive on this website. Take it from an American citizen who travels to Cuba all the time - American travel to Cuba is easier than ever.
Despite what many Americans believe to be a full Cuba travel ban, there are many ways to legally travel to Cuba for American citizens. In fact, traveling to Cuba is quite easy.
While Americans traveling to Cuba need to be aware of certain restrictions that the U.S. government imposes on its own citizens' travel plans in Cuba, Cuba is NOT off-limits to Americans!
In this ultimate guide to Cuba travel for Americans, we're including all the details you'll need to know to plan your trip to Cuba, plus answering some of the most common questions about Cuba travel safety, travel, and more.

title: Is Travel Insurance Worth It? (2023 Guide)
author: Taylor Medine
excerpt: Travel insurance is worthwhile when you book long trips — especially stays abroad — since coverage can limit out-of-pocket costs in the event of an emergency.
abstract:
Travel insurance is worth considering even if it's not required to visit a destination. Think of it as a financial safety net when you go away. Chances are your itinerary will go off without a hitch, but if mishaps happen, you could be on the hook for unexpected costs.

We at the Guides Home Team have researched the best travel insurance companies to help you decide if purchasing a policy is worth it. Travel insurance can pay for trip delays, lost personal items and medical emergencies. Plus, it might even reimburse prepaid expenses if you have to cancel altogether.

title: TICO Survey Finds Ontarians Eager To Travel, But Wary Of Getting There

abstract:
New research from the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO) confirms strong travel intentions by Ontarians this spring and summer. But the survey also found that travellers are concerned about potential travel issues like delays and cancellations.
The survey of 1,200 Ontarians found that 68% intend to travel within Ontario during the spring and summer months, 51% intend to journey across Canada, and 47% intend to pack their bags for an international trip.
ADVERTISING
As Ontarians increasingly resume travel, 71% of respondents feel that the process is more complex now than it was prior to the start of the pandemic.

It's no wonder travelers are taking extra precautions as they plan their summer travel. So what's the best way to protect the travel bookings you've made? Yonder Travel Insurance explains how travel insurance can protect your trip costs from unexpected events and avoid unexpected out-of-pocket costs during your trip.
Protect Your Trip Investment
"Since booking accommodations, tours, and flights will be more expensive this year, travelers are more vulnerable to losing these costs if an unforeseen event causes them to cancel or interrupt their trip," says Terry Boynton, co-founder and president of Yonder Travel Insurance.

title: Is travel insurance worth it?
author: Meghna Maharishi
excerpt: Here's everything you need to know about travel insurance and whether you should purchase it for your next trip.
abstract:
You've spent weeks meticulously 
planning your vacation
 — everything from airfare and hotels to an itinerary. However, what do you do when something unexpected occurs and suddenly you can't take your trip?
Some purchase travel insurance. It can help you potentially avoid losing the thousands of dollars you spent on your vacation.
But when is travel insurance worth buying?
Here's everything you need to know about travel insurance so you can decide if you should purchase a policy for your next trip.

title: Importance of Travel Tips Traveling to a new place can be a daunting experience, especially for someone who hasn't visited the place before. Knowing the best ways to travel and reliable places to eat and socialize can make one's trip stress-free. However, finding unique activities and hidden gems can be a challenge, especially when searching online. Hamiczech's Extensive Blog and Travel Experiences Hamiczech is a travel blogger and influencer who has traveled extensively to various countries, including Austria, Croatia, Italy, Spain, Turkey, and the United Arab Emirates, among others. She is an avid explorer who has tried various activities and restaurants. Hamiczech fearlessly explores the world, from skiing to visiting castles to going deep into caves. Her experiences and honest reviews of hotels, restaurants and activities are an excellent resource for travelers who want to know all the details about a place. Find the Best Travel Tips with Hamiczech Hamiczech doesn't just travel to tourist destinations that many people have been to before. She actively seeks unique places and activities to find hidden gems that no other travel blogger has talked about. If travelers want to create unforgettable memories that last a lifetime, Hamiczech's blog is the perfect resource to find the best travel tips and tricks.

title: What makes TATA AIG Travel Insurance the Best
author: Jagrity Ahuja
excerpt: Travel policy offers far more value than just coverage for potential trip cancellation, delay, interruption, medical expenses, and lost luggage.
abstract:
Over 188 million passengers flew or travelled by air all over India in 2022. This spike in passengers also led to some travel-related issues, such as flight delays, luggage loss, trip cancellations, and so on. Despite the seemingly endless list of issues, many travellers still wonder if buying 
travel insurance
 is a good idea.
 
The key factors behind people not buying travel insurance are the inconvenience of the process and their lack of time. However, due to the increasing frequency of travel-related issues, the post-pandemic emphasis on safety, and the growing trend of travelling long distances, travel insurance is now becoming a crucial priority for many.

title: Can Americans Travel to Cuba? [2023 Update]
author: Carley Rojas Avila
excerpt: We're frequently asked - can Americans travel to Cuba? YES! In this guide to American travel to Cuba, learn how EASY US travel to Cuba can be.
abstract:
"Can Americans travel to Cuba?" is one of the most frequent questions we receive on this website. Take it from an American citizen who travels to Cuba all the time - American travel to Cuba is easier than ever.
Despite what many Americans believe to be a full Cuba travel ban, there are many ways to legally travel to Cuba for American citizens. In fact, traveling to Cuba is quite easy.
While Americans traveling to Cuba need to be aware of certain restrictions that the U.S. government imposes on its own citizens' travel plans in Cuba, Cuba is NOT off-limits to Americans!
In this ultimate guide to Cuba travel for Americans, we're including all the details you'll need to know to plan your trip to Cuba, plus answering some of the most common questions about Cuba travel safety, travel, and more.

title: TICO Survey Finds Ontarians Eager To Travel, But Wary Of Getting There
excerpt: New research from the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO) confirms strong travel intentions by Ontarians this spring and summer. But the survey also found that travellers are concerned about…
abstract:
New research from the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO) confirms strong travel intentions by Ontarians this spring and summer. But the survey also found that travellers are concerned about potential travel issues like delays and cancellations.
The survey of 1,200 Ontarians found that 68% intend to travel within Ontario during the spring and summer months, 51% intend to journey across Canada, and 47% intend to pack their bags for an international trip.
ADVERTISING
As Ontarians increasingly resume travel, 71% of respondents feel that the process is more complex now than it was prior to the start of the pandemic.

abstract:
Travel insurance is worth considering even if it's not required to visit a destination. Think of it as a financial safety net when you go away. Chances are your itinerary will go off without a hitch, but if mishaps happen, you could be on the hook for unexpected costs.

We at the Guides Home Team have researched the best travel insurance companies to help you decide if purchasing a policy is worth it. Travel insurance can pay for trip delays, lost personal items and medical emergencies. Plus, it might even reimburse prepaid expenses if you have to cancel altogether.

Employment benefits

title: Travel Insurance for a Turks and Caicos Vacation (2023)
author: Taylor Medine
excerpt: If you're planning a vacation to Turks and Caicos, purchasing travel insurance can help reduce sunken costs if you need to cancel your trip.
abstract:
When planning a trip to the Turks and Caicos Islands (TCI) for rest and relaxation, the last thing on your mind is calling off the trip — but life happens. Airlines might cancel flights, causing a travel delay, or there could be a family emergency that means you have to put off the vacation. Purchasing Turks and Caicos travel insurance coverage as a precautionary measure can reduce your sunken costs.

Travel insurance plans typically cover unreimbursed expenses related to trip cancellations, flight delays, lost luggage and more.

title: Should you get travel insurance for domestic trips?
author: Kelly Ernst
excerpt: Many people forgo travel insurance for domestic trips. Here's why that can be a pricey mistake.
abstract:
A lot goes into planning a trip. From time spent creating the perfect itinerary to money spent on travel and lodging, you have a lot invested in everything going smoothly. But life doesn't always follow your plans. Should the unexpected happen, the last thing you need to add to your stress is worry over how you'll afford to make things right.

Travel insurance can cover you in a host of situations, from flight delays to lost luggage, potentially saving you thousands of dollars. But many people don't opt for it, especially if they're not planning on leaving the country.

title: Unpacking travel privilege: Why Black representation matters in travel
author: Stephanie Jones
excerpt: The travel industry needs to be more inclusive in its offerings and leadership.
abstract:
We're now past the three-year mark of the pandemic, and global tourism is on the upswing. Along with it, there's a rise in Black consciousness, which has created an intensified interest in supporting Black, indigenous, and people of color (BIPOC) travel experiences and businesses, impacting how consumers research, plan, choose, and finalize details for their next destination.

Many travelers are paying close attention to whether companies are following through with promises from 2020, such as creating a more diverse and inclusive workforce at their own organizations as well partnering with more BIPOC-owned-and-operated business.

Cary
 Travel Express, located at 9 Jandus Road in Cary, recently attended MAST Travel Network Annual Awards Night on March 9.
Cary Travel Express received the MAST 2022 All Star award for having the top travel agency sales for the consortium of over 300 Midwest travel agencies, according to the news release. It also won the 2022 Best Travel Award Show.

title: New Reports Say Business Travel Isn't Going Back to Normal — Ever
author: Monica Pitrelli
excerpt: High travel costs, tighter corporate budgets and virtual meetings have permanently changed business travel, according to new corporate travel reports.
abstract:
The days of high-flying, big-spending business travel may be over for good.
 
As a new report by research company Morning Consult declared: Business travel will never return to normal.
 
Tighter corporate budgets and new ways of virtual working have permanently changed business travel, according to 
the report, titled "Business, but Not as Usual."
 
The report says the demographics are changing too — business travelers are now younger and more likely to fly in economy class, with about half earning less than $50,000 a year.

title: How millennials are redefining the Fintech Space in India
author: Akash Dahiya
excerpt: The millennial generation in India is quickly emerging as a driving force in the financial technology or fintech industry. Fintech is a rapidly growing industry that combines financial services and…
abstract:
The millennial generation in India is quickly emerging as a driving force in the financial technology or fintech industry. Fintech is a rapidly growing industry that combines financial services and technology to create innovative solutions for financial transactions and management. The millennials in India are embracing fintech services for their convenience, affordability, and ease of access, and are rapidly redefining the fintech space in the country.


One of the biggest ways that millennials are redefining the fintech space in India is through the use of mobile payments.

title: Average cost of travel insurance in 2023
author: Heidi Gollub
excerpt: Travel insurance can help protect your financial investment in an expensive vacation, and it might be cheaper than you think.
abstract:
Getty Images
 
 
 
 
 


Travel insurance costs an average of 5% to 6% of the cost of your trip. 
 
Your travel destination and your age impact the cost of travel insurance. 
 
Senior travelers need to budget extra for travel insurance as they pay a higher percentage of their trip cost — an average of 18% for 80-year-olds.


 
There are several factors that influence how much you'll pay for travel insurance, from your age and travel destination to the cost of your trip and the coverages you choose.

A majority of these bookings are being done by people between the age group of 25 and 45, as a gift to their parents, in-laws, family members or for themselves.

title: Corporate Travel Culture — What Do You Really Want?
excerpt: Corporate travel has undergone a significant transformation over the past few decades due to the increasing globalization of businesses. Travelling for work has become an integral part of business operations, and employees are expected to travel frequently to attend meetings, conferences, and other events. However, managing corporate travel can be a complex process that requires careful planning, coordination, and execution to ensure a seamless experience for employees. To manage corporate...
abstract:
Corporate travel has undergone a significant transformation over the past few decades due to the increasing globalization of businesses. Travelling for work has become an integral part of business operations, and employees are expected to travel frequently to attend meetings, conferences, and other events. However, managing corporate travel can be a complex process that requires careful planning, coordination, and execution to ensure a seamless experience for employees.

To manage corporate travel effectively, organizations must develop a travel culture that prioritizes employee safety, comfort, and well-being while optimizing travel costs and minimizing environmental impact.

title: How to fast travel in Dead Island 2
author: Hayden Hefford
excerpt: Dead Island 2 has 10 zones, and you can fast travel between them by visiting safe hub locations scattered throughout.
abstract:
Want to know how to fast travel in Dead Island 2?
 
Dead Island 2
 doesn't feature a big, seamless open world. Instead, it's a series of 10 zones to explore, tied together through loading screens. As some quests make you dart between zones like a proper Hell-A tourist, backtracking can become particularly painful if you don't use fast travel.


Dead Island 2 fast travel is an oddity, though, as you can't just whip open the map and select your preferred zone. In this guide, we'll explain how to fast travel in Dead Island 2, so you can zip around the map and tick off quests at incredible speed.

New figures released by the U.S. Travel Association show that direct spending on travel in the United States reached $1.2 trillion in 2022. That figure, which is on par with pre-pandemic levels, produced an economic footprint of $2.6 trillion.

getty
 
In recent years, the travel industry has witnessed a significant transformation, largely due to the rise of 
social media
. No longer are consumers solely dependent on traditional travel brands for planning and booking vacations. Instead, they increasingly turn to influencers, bloggers, online communities and various social media channels for recommendations and guidance.

title: Why you should get travel insurance, according to experts
author: Kelly Ernst
excerpt: Many travelers forgo travel insurance. Here's why experts say that's a bad idea.
abstract:
Even the best-laid travel plans can go awry, as anyone who's done their fair share of travel can attest to. When something happens to disrupt your trip, the last thing you want to worry about is how to afford to get things back on track.

Travel insurance can save the day — and save you thousands of dollars — in these situations. From lost luggage to additional lodging and food costs, it covers a host of setbacks that could occur when you travel.

Yet many travelers forgo it, thinking they don't need it or it's not worth the cost.

title: Kuala Lumpur Was Most-Visited SEA City As Travel Activity Surged in 2022, Airbnb Reveals
author: Dale John Wong
excerpt: What pandemic?
abstract:
> Life 
 
New data from Airbnb reveals that Southeast Asia is experiencing a surge in travel as the region continues to recover from the pandemic. According to internal data from the platform, the number of nights booked across Southeast Asia on Airbnb doubled in 2022 compared to 2020, indicating a positive uptrend towards travel activity similar to that before the COVID-19 pandemic.
 
While Thailand was the most visited country on Airbnb in Southeast Asia in 2022, Malaysia's Kuala Lumpur was ranked the most-visited city during the same year, followed by Bangkok and Phuket in Thailand, Pattaya in Thailand, and Chiang Mai in Thailand.

author: CNW Group

abstract:
Nearly 7-in-10 Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer, while 2-in-3 are concerned about having their travel plans delayed or cancelled.
MISSISSAUGA, ON, March 29, 2023 /CNW/ - New research from the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO) confirms a strong intention by Ontarians to travel this spring and summer. According to a survey of 1,200 Ontarians, 68% of survey respondents intend to travel within Ontario, 51% intend to journey across Canada, while 47% intend to pack their bags for an international trip.

abstract:
Should I stay or should I go?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This advertisement has not loaded yet, but your article continues below. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
According to a new study
 by the Travel Industry Council of Ontario (TICO), nearly 70% of Ontarians intend to travel this spring and summer but 65% are still concerned about having their plans delayed or cancelled.
 
The poll shows that 68% intend to travel within the province, 51% within Canada and 47% intend to go on an international trip.
 
The study also shows that 71% feel that travel is more complicated now than it was prior to the start of COVID-19 with 60% saying that being stranded from home is a concern.

Here's everything you need to know about travel insurance so you can decide if you should purchase a policy for your next trip.

title: Can Americans Travel to Cuba? [2023 Update]
author: Carley Rojas Avila
excerpt: We're frequently asked - can Americans travel to Cuba? YES! In this guide to American travel to Cuba, learn how EASY US travel to Cuba can be.
abstract:
"Can Americans travel to Cuba?" is one of the most frequent questions we receive on this website. Take it from an American citizen who travels to Cuba all the time - American travel to Cuba is easier than ever.
Despite what many Americans believe to be a full Cuba travel ban, there are many ways to legally travel to Cuba for American citizens. In fact, traveling to Cuba is quite easy.
While Americans traveling to Cuba need to be aware of certain restrictions that the U.S. government imposes on its own citizens' travel plans in Cuba, Cuba is NOT off-limits to Americans!
In this ultimate guide to Cuba travel for Americans, we're including all the details you'll need to know to plan your trip to Cuba, plus answering some of the most common questions about Cuba travel safety, travel, and more.

title: What Are The Benefits Of A Business Credit Card?
author: Am Edt
excerpt: While money can't solve all your problems, it certainly helps and can put you at a major advantage. Businesses that have access to enough money or capital can cover its needs, make smart investment decisions and respond effectively to changing market conditions. How do you get access to more money for your business? For starters, […]
abstract:
While money can't solve all your problems, it certainly helps and can put you at a major advantage. Businesses that have access to enough money or capital can cover its needs, make smart investment decisions and respond effectively to changing market conditions.

How do you get access to more money for your business? For starters, applying for a business credit card is an excellent decision.

What Is a Business Credit Card?

Business credit cards are geared and tailored toward business owners. Whether you own a small or start-up business, are a sole proprietor or are the owner of a large multinational company, you can apply for and benefit from a business credit card.

abstract:
The following are remarks from the general manager of Chase Ink, Jenny Shum. They have been lightly edited for clarity and length. 
 
Small business owners have dealt with tremendous economic obstacles over the last three years. While overcoming a pandemic, they have endured record-setting interest rates, inflation, an unreliable supply chain and a historically tight job market. Suffice it to say, small business owners are incredibly resilient.
 
Fortunately, the outlook for 2023 appears brighter.

As a business analyst, you smooth out the kinks in an organization's processes, improving business efficiency. These professionals make above-average wages and can expect faster-than-average employment growth over the next decade.

abstract:
When starting a business, there are many different things you have to prepare.
From employing workers to stocking up inventory, a lot goes into building a business. The process of getting it all together does not happen overnight.
Despite all our planning, sometimes things are out of our control. One day you could walk into your store and find out the sprinkler broke overnight, leaking onto all the products. You could leave one night and immediately after, someone breaks in and steals from your business.

suggests

Some 39 percent of employees hope to own their own business;
 than 50 percent of workers in their 20s who don't own a business hope to do so in the future;
50 percent of workers in their 30s and 35 percent in their 40s want to start their own business; and
Even 25 percent of workers in their 50s and 17 percent of workers age 60 or older who do not currently own a business want to do so in the future.

Bill and Melinda Gates ended their marriage, but the foundation they started together remains in tact.
The billionaire Microsoft founder announced his plans to separate from his wife of 27 years in May 2021, and their divorce was finalized in August 2021.
"After a great deal of thought and a lot of work on our relationship, we have made the decision to end our marriage," Bill Gates said in a tweet. "Over the last 27 years, we have raised three incredible children and built a foundation that works all over the world to enable all people to lead healthy, productive lives.

title: Key reasons why Indian entrepreneurs invest abroad to seek business residency
author: guest
excerpt: A look at business investor residency program of UAE, Canada, Germany, UK and Austria.
abstract:
By Lavanya Anand
India has the third largest start-up ecosystem in the world which is expected to witness a consistent annual growth of 12 to 15%. With the rise in the entrepreneurial culture in India, Indian entrepreneurs with innovative start-up ideas are looking to acquire residency through the business set-up route in countries that offer environment conducive to their business.
Access to foreign talent, a favourable business environment, opportunity for innovation and quality of living are some of the key reasons why Indian entrepreneurs are seeking business residency.

title: Documents you need to apply for fast business loans
author: ter
excerpt: Fast business lenders only ask for the most basic documents to assess your finances.
abstract:
If your company needs quick cash, you'll want to apply for a fast business loan. These loans offer same-day approvals and funding within one to three days. They tend to come from online lenders or other specialized business lenders.
To keep things moving quickly, these lenders typically have short applications and limited documentation requirements. But you'll still need to have some paperwork to submit with your application.

Most fast business lenders will need you to provide some basic details about yourself.

title: Entrepreneur vs. Business Owner: What's the Difference?
author: Bailey Maybray
excerpt: The difference between an entrepreneur and business owner comes down to motives, profitability, risk positivity, and more.
abstract:
If you run a business, what do you call yourself: an entrepreneur or business owner? Is it dependent on how much risk you take? Your industry? Your business structure? Or is it just a personal preference?

Whether you are an entrepreneur or business owner depends on a combination of factors, including your company's ambitions, goals, or legal structure.

Differences between Entrepreneurs and Business Owners

The difference between an entrepreneur and business owner can depend on interpretation — one person might disagree with another on what makes someone an entrepreneur or a business owner.

title: 5 reasons why business credit is so important
excerpt: Overall, if you increase your business credit score, you can expect to see numerous benefits for your business, including increased access to funding, improved credibility, better cash flow, and…
abstract:
Looking to establish or improve your business credit?
Here are 5 reasons why business credit is so important and what you can expect to see for your business if you increase your credit score, 
according to J White Enterprises
.
Good business credit can help you secure funding from lenders, investors, and other sources. With a higher credit score, you may qualify for better interest rates and loan terms, which can help you save money and expand your business.
A strong business credit profile can help establish credibility with suppliers, vendors, and customers.

title: Business Architecture Guild® Releases BIZBOK® Guide v12
author: PR Newswire
excerpt: The Business Architecture Guild®, an international community of business architecture practitioners, announced today that A Guide to the Business Architecture Body of Knowledge® (BIZBOK® Guide) v12 is now available.
abstract:
New updates highlight the critical role of business architecture for organizational agility and success
SAN FRANCISCO, April 5, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The Business Architecture Guild®, an international community of business architecture practitioners, announced today that A Guide to the Business Architecture Body of Knowledge® (BIZBOK® Guide) v12 is now available.
Recognized as the leading resource for business architecture, the BIZBOK is a collection of formal principles, guidelines and best practices that helps organizations improve their ability to successfully execute their business strategies.

'The CFPB's important work to advance transparency and improve data collection in small business lending enables the Biden-Harris Administration to take a step forward in its mission to deliver equitable outcomes for Americans.

author: APO Group
excerpt: The Business Council for Africa (BCA) (https://BCAfrica.org/) is proud to announce the nominees for the inaugural African Business Book of the Year award. The prize is designed to recognise and celebrate business-related stories from the continent and encourage more high-quality writing on business, economics, and management in Africa. The nominees for the African Business Book […]
abstract:
The Business Council for Africa (BCA) (https://BCAfrica.org/) is proud to announce the nominees for the inaugural African Business Book of the Year award. The prize is designed to recognise and celebrate business-related stories from the continent and encourage more high-quality writing on business, economics, and management in Africa.

The nominees for the African Business Book of the Year award are:

Leaving the Tarmac: Buying a Bank in Africa by Aigboje Aig-Imoukhuede
Africa: Open for Business by Dr Deanne De Vries
Imported: Locking in Africa's Value(s) by Chuks Ibechukwu
Blood and Diamonds: Germany's Imperial Ambitions in Africa by Steven Press
The Time-Travelling Economist: Why Education, Electricity and Fertility Are Key to Escaping Poverty by Charlie Robertson
Africa 2.

title: Expansion of Business Sectors Subject to Investment Screening in Japan for the Purpose of Securing Stable Supply Chains
author: Yuki Sakurada
excerpt: On March 9, 2023, the Ministry of Finance and competent ministries released, among other documents, draft amendments to the public notices concerning…
abstract: On March 9, 2023, the Ministry of Finance and competent ministries released, among other documents, draft amendments to the public notices concerning the Japanese government security screening system for certain investments and other activities made or conducted by foreign investors, whereby subject business sectors will be added ('Draft Public Notices'). The public comment procedure for the Draft Public Notices has begun and will end on April 7. Accordingly, this Newsletter provides a brief outline of the Draft Public Notices.

title: 11 reasons you should have started thinking about your exit yesterday
author: Tom Bronson
excerpt: An exit strategy prepares you for the worst. If you start to prepare less than two years before the planned exit, there is little you can do to change the outcome.
abstract:
Exit strategy is good business strategy. Everything you need to do to prepare your business for an exit at the highest possible price will simultaneously improve how your business performs and earns today.

A great exit strategy also prepares you for the worst. If forced to exit unexpectedly, it helps if you are ready.

Here's why you needed to start thinking about your exit strategy yesterday.

1. Your business probably carries more risk than you think

Many business owners have let risky business practices – such as having outdated insurance policies or supplier concentration – go on too long because they haven't caused problems yet,.

title: How to Apply for an Innovator Founder Visa
author: Paul Richmond
excerpt: The Innovator Founder Visa is for start-up entrepreneurs and experienced businesspersons seeking to establish a business in the UK. Applicants do not…
abstract:
The 
Innovator Founder Visa
 is for start-up entrepreneurs and experienced businesspersons seeking to establish a business in the UK. Applicants do not need to have any specific level of funds to invest in their proposed business, but must have an innovative, viable and scalable business idea, supported by a business plan, which has been approved by an endorsing body. 


Applicants for an Innovator Founder Visa must have generated, or have significantly contributed to, their business idea.  Innovator Founders must also intend to have a key role in the day-to-day management and development of their business.

Chase Ink Business Preferred Credit Card
 and 
The Business Platinum Card® from American Express
 are both TPG favorites for 
small businesses,

title: If Trump's mugshot is made public it would cement him as an 'outlaw' and could make him a folk hero like Al Capone, presidential historian says
author: Bill Gates
excerpt: Alan Dershowitz, who served on Trump's legal team during his first impeachment, suggested the ex-president should use his mugshot as a campaign poser.
abstract:
Former President Donald Trump has been indicted by a Manhattan grand jury. He's the first former US president to ever face criminal charges, and there's no comparable moment in the country's history, presidential historian Douglas Brinkley told NPR on Friday.
Load Error
"We've never had anything like this," Brinkley said. "This is the first time that it really seems likely that the former president of the United States will be having a mugshot, being fingerprinted."
Trump is planning to surrender to the Manhattan district attorney's office next week, probably on Tuesday, according to his attorney Joe Tacopina.

title: What Are The Benefits Of A Business Credit Card?
author: Am Edt
excerpt: While money can't solve all your problems, it certainly helps and can put you at a major advantage. Businesses that have access to enough money or capital can cover its needs, make smart investment decisions and respond effectively to changing market conditions. How do you get access to more money for your business? For starters, […]
abstract:
While money can't solve all your problems, it certainly helps and can put you at a major advantage. Businesses that have access to enough money or capital can cover its needs, make smart investment decisions and respond effectively to changing market conditions.

How do you get access to more money for your business? For starters, applying for a business credit card is an excellent decision.

What Is a Business Credit Card?

Business credit cards are geared and tailored toward business owners. Whether you own a small or start-up business, are a sole proprietor or are the owner of a large multinational company, you can apply for and benefit from a business credit card.

Small business owners have dealt with tremendous economic obstacles over the last three years. While overcoming a pandemic, they have endured record-setting interest rates, inflation, an unreliable supply chain and a historically tight job market. Suffice it to say, small business owners are incredibly resilient.
 
Fortunately, the outlook for 2023 appears brighter.

abstract:
When starting a business, there are many different things you have to prepare.
From employing workers to stocking up inventory, a lot goes into building a business. The process of getting it all together does not happen overnight.
Despite all our planning, sometimes things are out of our control. One day you could walk into your store and find out the sprinkler broke overnight, leaking onto all the products. You could leave one night and immediately after, someone breaks in and steals from your business.

suggests
:
Some 39 percent of employees hope to own their own business;
 than 50 percent of workers in their 20s who don't own a business hope to do so in the future;
50 percent of workers in their 30s and 35 percent in their 40s want to start their own business; and
Even 25 percent of workers in their 50s and 17 percent of workers age 60 or older who do not currently own a business want to do so in the future.

abstract:
Bill and Melinda Gates ended their marriage, but the foundation they started together remains in tact.
The billionaire Microsoft founder announced his plans to separate from his wife of 27 years in May 2021, and their divorce was finalized in August 2021.
"After a great deal of thought and a lot of work on our relationship, we have made the decision to end our marriage," Bill Gates said in a tweet. "Over the last 27 years, we have raised three incredible children and built a foundation that works all over the world to enable all people to lead healthy, productive lives.

title: Key reasons why Indian entrepreneurs invest abroad to seek business residency
author: guest
excerpt: A look at business investor residency program of UAE, Canada, Germany, UK and Austria.
abstract:
By Lavanya Anand
India has the third largest start-up ecosystem in the world which is expected to witness a consistent annual growth of 12 to 15%. With the rise in the entrepreneurial culture in India, Indian entrepreneurs with innovative start-up ideas are looking to acquire residency through the business set-up route in countries that offer environment conducive to their business.
Access to foreign talent, a favourable business environment, opportunity for innovation and quality of living are some of the key reasons why Indian entrepreneurs are seeking business residency.

title: Documents you need to apply for fast business loans
author: ter
excerpt: Fast business lenders only ask for the most basic documents to assess your finances.
abstract:
If your company needs quick cash, you'll want to apply for a fast business loan. These loans offer same-day approvals and funding within one to three days. They tend to come from online lenders or other specialized business lenders.
To keep things moving quickly, these lenders typically have short applications and limited documentation requirements. But you'll still need to have some paperwork to submit with your application.

Most fast business lenders will need you to provide some basic details about yourself.

title: 5 reasons why business credit is so important
excerpt: Overall, if you increase your business credit score, you can expect to see numerous benefits for your business, including increased access to funding, improved credibility, better cash flow, and…
abstract:
Looking to establish or improve your business credit?
Here are 5 reasons why business credit is so important and what you can expect to see for your business if you increase your credit score, 
according to J White Enterprises
.
Good business credit can help you secure funding from lenders, investors, and other sources. With a higher credit score, you may qualify for better interest rates and loan terms, which can help you save money and expand your business.
A strong business credit profile can help establish credibility with suppliers, vendors, and customers.

 from the IIBA is a new certification that 'recognizes your ability to effectively execute analysis-related work in support of business analytics initiatives.' To pass the exam, you will need to examine a real-world business problem, identify the data sources and how to obtain data, analyze the data, interpret and report results from the data.

abstract: On March 9, 2023, the Ministry of Finance and competent ministries released, among other documents, draft amendments to the public notices concerning the Japanese government security screening system for certain investments and other activities made or conducted by foreign investors, whereby subject business sectors will be added ('Draft Public Notices'). title: Entrepreneur vs. Business Owner: What's the Difference?
author: Bailey Maybray

abstract:
If you run a business, what do you call yourself: an entrepreneur or business owner? Is it dependent on how much risk you take? Your industry? Your business structure? Or is it just a personal preference?

Whether you are an entrepreneur or business owner depends on a combination of factors, including your company's ambitions, goals, or legal structure.

Differences between Entrepreneurs and Business Owners

The difference between an entrepreneur and business owner can depend on interpretation — one person might disagree with another on what makes someone an entrepreneur or a business owner.

author: Paul Richmond
excerpt: The Innovator Founder Visa is for start-up entrepreneurs and experienced businesspersons seeking to establish a business in the UK. Applicants do not…
abstract:
The 
Innovator Founder Visa
 is for start-up entrepreneurs and experienced businesspersons seeking to establish a business in the UK. Applicants do not need to have any specific level of funds to invest in their proposed business, but must have an innovative, viable and scalable business idea, supported by a business plan, which has been approved by an endorsing body. 


Applicants for an Innovator Founder Visa must have generated, or have significantly contributed to, their business idea.  Innovator Founders must also intend to have a key role in the day-to-day management and development of their business.

The prize is designed to recognise and celebrate business-related stories from the continent and encourage more high-quality writing on business, economics, and management in Africa.

Africa by Aigboje Aig-Imoukhuede Africa: Open for Business by Dr Deanne De Vries

by Dr Deanne De Vries Imported: Locking in Africa's Value(s) by Chuks Ibechukwu

title: 11 reasons you should have started thinking about your exit yesterday
author: Tom Bronson
excerpt: An exit strategy prepares you for the worst. If you start to prepare less than two years before the planned exit, there is little you can do to change the outcome.
abstract:
Exit strategy is good business strategy. Everything you need to do to prepare your business for an exit at the highest possible price will simultaneously improve how your business performs and earns today.

A great exit strategy also prepares you for the worst. If forced to exit unexpectedly, it helps if you are ready.

Here's why you needed to start thinking about your exit strategy yesterday.

1. Your business probably carries more risk than you think

Many business owners have let risky business practices – such as having outdated insurance policies or supplier concentration – go on too long because they haven't caused problems yet,.

title: If Trump's mugshot is made public it would cement him as an 'outlaw' and could make him a folk hero like Al Capone, presidential historian says
author: Bill Gates
excerpt: Alan Dershowitz, who served on Trump's legal team during his first impeachment, suggested the ex-president should use his mugshot as a campaign poser.
abstract:
Former President Donald Trump has been indicted by a Manhattan grand jury. He's the first former US president to ever face criminal charges, and there's no comparable moment in the country's history, presidential historian Douglas Brinkley told NPR on Friday.
Load Error
"We've never had anything like this," Brinkley said. "This is the first time that it really seems likely that the former president of the United States will be having a mugshot, being fingerprinted."
Trump is planning to surrender to the Manhattan district attorney's office next week, probably on Tuesday, according to his attorney Joe Tacopina.

excerpt: The Business Architecture Guild®, an international community of business architecture practitioners, announced today that A Guide to the Business Architecture Body of Knowledge® (BIZBOK® Guide) v12 is now available.
abstract:
New updates highlight the critical role of business architecture for organizational agility and success
SAN FRANCISCO, April 5, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The Business Architecture Guild®, an international community of business architecture practitioners, announced today that A Guide to the Business Architecture Body of Knowledge® (BIZBOK® Guide) v12 is now available.
Recognized as the leading resource for business architecture, the BIZBOK is a collection of formal principles, guidelines and best practices that helps organizations improve their ability to successfully execute their business strategies.

abstract:
If you buy something through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners.

Choosing the perfect business name idea for your new venture is an important step on the entrepreneurial journey. A well-chosen business name not only defines your brand's identity but also impacts customer perception and recall.
In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the importance of naming your business and creative strategies for brainstorming names. We'll also look at resources for seeking professional assistance on how to come up with a great business name, and pitfalls to avoid during the naming process.

HALIFAX, WEST YORKSHIRE, UNITED KINGDOM, April 3, 2023/ EINPresswire.com / -- Business Awards UK: The winners of the UK Small Business Awards 2022 by Business Awards UK have been published. The awards recognised outstanding achievements of small businesses from across the United Kingdom, celebrating entrepreneurial spirit, innovation, and excellence. The UK Small Business Awards 2022 showcase the talent and hard work of small businesses and highlight their contribution to the UK economy.

title: 5 reasons why business credit is so important
excerpt: Overall, if you increase your business credit score, you can expect to see numerous benefits for your business, including increased access to funding, improved credibility, better cash flow, and…
abstract:
Looking to establish or improve your business credit?
Here are 5 reasons why business credit is so important and what you can expect to see for your business if you increase your credit score, 
according to J White Enterprises
.
Good business credit can help you secure funding from lenders, investors, and other sources. With a higher credit score, you may qualify for better interest rates and loan terms, which can help you save money and expand your business.
A strong business credit profile can help establish credibility with suppliers, vendors, and customers.

Washington D.C., March 30, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Administrator Isabella Casillas Guzman, head of the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA) and the voice in President Biden's Cabinet for America's 33 million small businesses, issued the following statement on the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) finalizing Section 1071, a rule that aims to increase transparency in small business lending, promote economic development, and combat unlawful discrimination:
'The CFPB's important work to advance transparency and improve data collection in small business lending enables the Biden-Harris Administration to take a step forward in its mission to deliver equitable outcomes for Americans.

author: APO Group
excerpt: The Business Council for Africa (BCA) (https://BCAfrica.org/) is proud to announce the nominees for the inaugural African Business Book of the Year award. The prize is designed to recognise and celebrate business-related stories from the continent and encourage more high-quality writing on business, economics, and management in Africa. The nominees for the African Business Book […]
abstract:
The Business Council for Africa (BCA) (https://BCAfrica.org/) is proud to announce the nominees for the inaugural African Business Book of the Year award. The prize is designed to recognise and celebrate business-related stories from the continent and encourage more high-quality writing on business, economics, and management in Africa.

The nominees for the African Business Book of the Year award are:

Leaving the Tarmac: Buying a Bank in Africa by Aigboje Aig-Imoukhuede
Africa: Open for Business by Dr Deanne De Vries
Imported: Locking in Africa's Value(s) by Chuks Ibechukwu
Blood and Diamonds: Germany's Imperial Ambitions in Africa by Steven Press
The Time-Travelling Economist: Why Education, Electricity and Fertility Are Key to Escaping Poverty by Charlie Robertson
Africa 2.

title: 11 reasons you should have started thinking about your exit yesterday
author: Tom Bronson
excerpt: An exit strategy prepares you for the worst. If you start to prepare less than two years before the planned exit, there is little you can do to change the outcome.
abstract:
Exit strategy is good business strategy. Everything you need to do to prepare your business for an exit at the highest possible price will simultaneously improve how your business performs and earns today.

A great exit strategy also prepares you for the worst. If forced to exit unexpectedly, it helps if you are ready.

Here's why you needed to start thinking about your exit strategy yesterday.

1. Your business probably carries more risk than you think

Many business owners have let risky business practices – such as having outdated insurance policies or supplier concentration – go on too long because they haven't caused problems yet,.

title: Paper Weight: Impactful Faculty Research Drives Increase in Leeds' Rankings
excerpt: Leeds' impressive research contributions are helping the school, and its faculty, shine in influential ranking.
abstract:
As research productivity soars worldwide, Leeds professors continue to enjoy outsized influence in advancing business knowledge.
​
 




Research faculty at Leeds were recognized as being among North America‘s most productive in the influential University of Texas at Dallas rankings, released April 4. 




When it comes to impact, a university's research successes don't always get the same attention as metrics like academic strength of a student body or alumni successes. 


But faculty research—which creates new knowledge and helps shape the direction and priorities of the business world—is just as important as how well those professors prepare students for success.

abstract: On March 9, 2023, the Ministry of Finance and competent ministries released, among other documents, draft amendments to the public notices concerning the Japanese government security screening system for certain investments and other activities made or conducted by foreign investors, whereby subject business sectors will be added ('Draft Public Notices'). title: What motivates Hawaii entrepreneurs to start their own businesses
author: Sophia Compton
excerpt: Among Hawaii entrepreneurs, 60.4% stated the freedom to work flexible hours was "very important," according to the U.S. Census Bureau's 2020 Annual Business Survey.
abstract:
Hawaii entrepreneurs said greater income, flexible hours, and being their own boss were among the main reasons behind starting their own business, according to a recent analysis by finance company OnDeck of the latest Annual Business Survey by the U.S. Census.

OnDeck utilized the 2020 Annual Business Survey — which asked business owners to rate the importance of each item on a list of reasons for owning their own business — and analyzed what business owners rated as "very important" based on different locations.
